title: Senior Front End Developer - FE Portals
content:
We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Front End Developer. You will work on a
diverse and global team of English-speaking developers, to implement and
maintain frontend libraries for our frontend developer platform. The ideal
candidate is not only proficient in Angular and TypeScript but also possesses
a passion for continuous learning, a knack for grasping complex technical
concepts, and excellent English communication skills. One of our projects you
could work on is open source: https://github.com/allianz/ng-aquila

What you do

  * Extend and maintain a UI Component library utilized by over 1000 developers within Allianz, ensuring consistency, scalability, and reusability across projects.
  * Stay updated with the latest Angular features, tools, and best practices.
  * Utilize Schematics or similar tools to automate repetitive tasks and streamline development processes.
  * Provide support to development teams in onboarding processes and offer third-level assistance in resolving complex technical issues.
  * Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to ensure high-quality software delivery.
  * Document technical specifications, procedures, and guidelines.
  * Collaborate with stakeholders to extend the frontend platform, integrating low-code capabilities to empower rapid application development.
  * Coordinate with teams across Allianz to ensure seamless updates
  * Develop comprehensive tests to ensure the reliability, performance, and functionality
  * Implement all components with WCAG AA accessibility compliance.

What you bring

  * Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent work experience).
  * Proven experience as an Angular/TypeScript Developer or similar role.
  * Strong understanding of Angular framework concepts, including components, services, routing, and dependency injection.
  * Experience with version control systems (Git)
  * Familiarity with automated testing frameworks like Jasmine and Karma.
  * Knowledge of front-end build tools like Angular CLI.
  * Ability to grasp complex technical topics quickly and effectively.
  * Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
  * Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities.

content:
More than just a recruitment company. At PRTR, we have been a part of our
customer's success for 30 years as their total HR solutions partner. With 550
dedicated professionals and over 15,000 outsourced staff, we will continue to
carry out our mission to develop a better career, a better life, and a better
society, and thrive to become the No.1 people solutions organization in
Southeast Asia.  
  
**Key Responsibilities**  

  * **Solution Deployment:** Leading the deployment of corporate IT solutions within the APAC region, including tools like Microsoft Teams, Salesforce, and SAP.

  * Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with a focus on service orientation and problem-solving.
  * Fluent in English and Thai.
  * Willing to travel within the APAC region.

title: Senior Developer - Oracle
content:
**About the role**

Join the growing team at Professional One Co., Ltd. as a Senior Developer -
Oracle. In this full-time, office-based role in Bangkok, Bueng Kum, you will
utilise your expertise in Oracle development to drive the success of critical
IT projects. Reporting to the Head of IT, you will play a pivotal part in
shaping the company's technology strategy and delivering high-quality
solutions.

  
**Job Description**

  * Be familiar with oracle technology such Oracle DB and related programming language such as java, pl/sql and linux script.
  * Be advantage if you are familiar with Oracle Retail Suite or Oracle ERP.
  * Create data flow/system flow/detail design to make the team clear in backlog and acceptance criteria.
  * Create related documents as knowledge management for team and stakeholder.
  * Co-ordinate with stakeholder (Business Team/Developer/QA/TPM/DEVOPS/Solution Architect) to solve any blocking issue in solftware development.
  * Understand and adapt testing methodology and work with QA team to delivery software with Quality.
  * Understand and adapt Agile methodology in software development.
  * Understand and adapt CI/CD and be familiar with DEVOPS tools in software development.
  * Work with L1/L2 support team as L3 to solve any production issues within SLA.
  * Be senior team member and work with teammate to delivery software with quality. And be consultant for Jr. team member to solve some blocking problems.  

**Qualification**

  * Bachelor’s in Computer Science or related field.
  * 6+ years in Developer/System Analyst with leadership experience.
  * Proficient in Oracle Database, PL/SQL, Java, and Linux scripting. Experience with Oracle Retail Suite or Oracle ERP/Oracle Retail is a strong advantage.
  * Skilled in creating data flows, system flows, and detailed design documentation to clarify requirements and acceptance criteria for the team.
  * Strong coordination skills to work effectively with business teams, developers, QA, DevOps, and Solution Architects to resolve development issues and remove blockers.
  * Experienced in Agile methodology.
  * Ability to serve as L3 support for production issues, providing mentorship to junior team members and ensuring high-quality delivery.
  * Good English proficiency.

**About us**

Professional One Co., Ltd. is a leading provider of innovative IT solutions
and services. With a focus on delivering transformative technology, we empower
our clients to achieve their business objectives. Our team of talented
professionals is dedicated to excellence, innovation, and customer
satisfaction. Join us and be a part of our exciting journey.

Apply now for this exciting opportunity!

title: System Development & Support
content:
## **คุณสมบัติ**

  * วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี สาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์, IT หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง
  * มีประสบการณ์ทำงานกับบริษัทพัฒนาโปรแกรมสำหรับบริหารจัดการโรงแรมไม่น้อยกว่า 1 ปี
  * มีประสบการณ์ในการ Support User โรงแรมไม่น้อยกว่า 1 ปี
  * มีความรู้และทักษะการพัฒนาโปรแกรมบน Web และเข้าใจ Operation ของโรงแรมเป็นอย่างดี
  * มีความเข้าใจระบบ Database, Network, Hardware, Software และ Security เป็นอย่างดี
  * สามารถพัฒนาโปรแกรม ออกแบบฐานข้อมูล รับ Requirements จาก User ได้โดยตรง และ Support End Users ได้

## **ลักษณะงานที่รับผิดชอบ**

  1. พัฒนาโปรแกรมสำหรับใช้งานกับโรงแรมในเครือ Grande Centre Point 
  2. สนับสนุนการทำงานของ User โดยให้คำแนะนำในการใช้งาน แก้ไขปัญหา และปรับปรุงพัฒนาให้ระบบทำงานได้อย่างราบรื่น
  3. วิเคราะห์และแก้ไขปัญหาของโปรแกรมที่ User พบเจอ และแก้ไขปรับปรุงให้โปรแกรมทำงานได้ถูกต้อง
  4. ติดตามการทำงานของฐานข้อมูลและโปรแกรม รวมถึงทำ Preventive Maintenance เพื่อให้โปรแกรมทำงานได้อย่างถูกต้องและมีเสถียรภาพตลอดเวลา
  5. จัดทำรายงานในการใช้งานโปรแกรมให้ส่วนของ User และฝ่ายบริหาร
  6. ดูแล Support และพัฒนาโปรแกรม หากเคย Support หรือพัฒนาโปรแกรม Comanche จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

title: Front end Developer
content:
**Location – Vorawat Building , Silom Road– 100% Work From Office - No Hybrid
and no Remote**

**Budget 45 K – 50 K THB/Month + Benefits (Have Bonus) - Permanent Position**

**Thai Speaker No English Speaking Required**

**Job Description for Front-end Developer (Angular, C# and .NET )- 70% Front
end and 30% Backend**

  * **Minimum 3 years of experience in front-end development using Angular.**

Key Responsibilities:

1\. Develop and maintain the front-end of web applications using the Angular
Framework.

2\. Design and implement user-friendly UI/UX interfaces based on user
requirements.

3\. Integrate with back-end services via RESTful APIs or GraphQL.

4\. Collaborate with the development team, including System Analysts, Back-end
Developers, and UX/UI Designers, to plan and design solutions.

practices for development.

fields.

libraries like NgRx.

7\. Proficient in code versioning tools such as GIT.

team environment.

Full-time in-office position with standard business hours.

title: ABAP Developer - Onsite Silom
content:
**Role: ABAP Developer**  
**Company: Oil & Gas** **company**  
**Location: Silom**

**Contract period:** 1 Year extendable

1\. Job Description :  
An SAP Back-end Developer creates applications and data models on various SAP
platforms. They require knowledge of the ABAP programming language, SAP
development tools, and how developments are organized and transported.  
\- In collaboration with functional teams, gather and understand user
requirements  
\- Back-end development on SAP platforms, which in most of the cases relies on
ABAP but could be other languages as well  
\- On occasions, work on front end development efforts on SAP Platforms, which
could also require expertise on ABAP and SAPUI5  
\- Deploy code through the development workflow with managing QA steps  
  
2.Job Responsibilities :  
\- Responsible for designing, developing, and supporting various new and
existing SAP application backend development  
\- Maintaining awareness of industry best practices and standards, etc.  
\- This role will be asked to help contribute to maturing development
processes and assisting teammates  
\- They will have to both collaborate with the team on larger features as well
as work independently on smaller ones.  
\- Understand technical frameworks and landscape in order to provide
explanations of various software alternatives  
\- Ensure business requirements are included and appropriately tested  
\- Steward engagement progress to stakeholders & discuss scope change and
impact regularly (requirements management)  
  
3.Primary skills set :  
\- ABAP Development  
ex., Object Oriented, Reporting, ALV  
\- ABAP Enhancement  
ex., BADI, CMOD, SMOD, SPAU, SPDD, SPAU_ENH, User Exits, Append Structure,
Form Printing  
\- ABAP Interface  
ex., ALE/IDoc, RFC/BAPI, Proxy, Flat file, XI/PI/PO/CPI, SAP OData, Cloud
Development, APIs  
  
4.Nice to Have skill sets :  
\- Dynpro programming  
\- Fiori  
\- SAPUI5  
\- SAP Web IDE  
\- Work experience in SAFe Agile teams  
  
5.Soft skill sets :  
\- Good teamwork and attitude with ability to do self-learning  
\- Good written and verbal communication skills in English  
\- Ability to learn new programming languages and technologies  
\- Motivation to stay on top of technology trend and development  
\- Customer focus and service mind

title: Backend Developer (API Service) (DGADB05)
content:
**วุฒิการศึกษา**

  * ขั้นต่ำปริญญาตรี

**ประสบการณ์การทำงาน**

  * ประสบการณ์การทำงานด้าน Progtamming ไม่ต่ำกว่า 3 ปี
  * ประสบการณ์พัฒนา Application Programming Interface (API) แบบ Microservice ด้วยภาษา ASP.NET Core ไม่ต่ำกว่า 1 ปี
  * ประสบการณ์อื่นๆที่จะได้รับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ
    * DevOps Tools ต่างๆ เช่น Git, CI/CD Tools
    * Public Cloud Services
    * Message Brokers (Messaging Queue)
    * Caching
    * Mongo DB
    * Unit Test
    * Secure Coding
    * Performance Coding
    * ความรู้ในการทำงานร่วมกับ Docker และ K8S

**คุณสมบัติ**

  * มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับ RESTful Api และการออกแบบระบบที่มีคามเสถียร รองรับการใช้งานจำนวนมากได้
  * มีประสบการณ์ในการใช้ฐานข้อมูลแบบ Relational database และ NoSQL
  * มีความรู้ความเข้าใจ ในการบริหารจัดการ source code ด้วย Git
  * มีประสบการณืในการทำงาน แบบ Agile
  * มีทักษะการแก้ปัญหา และคิดเชิงวิเคราะห์ได้ดี
  * สามารถสื่อสาร และทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดี

**หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ**

  * ออกแบบและพัฒนา Backend API Service
  * สร้างและบำรุงรักษาโค้ดที่มีคุณภาพสูง และสามารถนำกลับมาใช้ใหม่ได้
  * ทำการเขียนและทดสอบ Unittes เพื่อให้แน่ใจว่าโค้ดมีความถูกต้องและไม่มีข้อผิดพลาด
  * ทำงานร่วมกับทีม Frontend, UX/UI Designer และ DevOps เพื่อพัฒนาฟีเจอร์ต่าง ๆ
  * แก้ไขปัญหาและปรับปรุงระบบให้มีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด
  * ทำการบำรุงรักษาและปรับปรุงฐานข้อมูลให้มีความปลอดภัยและทันสมัย

title: Senior Developer (Android)
content:
As a Senior Android Developer, you'll take the lead in driving development
initiatives, work closely with cross-functional teams, mentor and guide junior
developers, and ensure the creation of high-quality, scalable, and user-
centric applications.

**Main role and responsibilities**

• Design, develop, and maintain advanced applications for the Android platform

• Integrate applications with internal & external APIs and data sources

• Implement and enforce secure coding practices to prevent vulnerabilities

• Collaborate with security teams to ensure applications adhere to
cybersecurity standards and compliance requirements

• Assist in integration and functional testing of the application

• Assist the DevOps team in configuring and maintaining CI/CD workflows for
Android applications

**Required Technical and Professional Expertise**

• Proficient in Kotlin programming language, custom UI XML development and
strong understanding of the Android SDK

• Proficient in dependency management using Gradle (mandatory), including
experience with integrating third-party libraries from repositories like Maven
Central and JitPack

• Familiarity with modern Android architecture components such as ViewModel,
LiveData, and Jetpack libraries

• Hands-on experience with app packaging, signing, and deployment to the
Google Play Store

• Familiarity with user-centered design principles to deliver highly intuitive
applications. For Android, this includes following Google’s Material Design
principles to ensure consistency and responsiveness

• Understanding of secure coding practices and adherence to OWASP standards.
Knowledge of secure coding practices and experience mitigating OWASP
vulnerabilities. Awareness of mobile application security frameworks and tools
(e.g., encryption, secure storage

**Business knowledge and experience**

• Familiarity with commercial banking workflows, including digital onboarding,
payment processing, loan management, and account management systems will be a
Plus.

• Experienced in developing secure, responsive, and accessible interfaces for
banking customers as well as touchpoints for bank employees will be a Plus.

• Familiarity with banking industry regulations such as PCI-DSS, AML, KYC,
PDPA will be a Plus.

**Qualifications**

• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or
equivalent experience).

• 7+ years of hands-on experience in Android development with a strong
portfolio of released Android applications.

• Expertise in Java and Kotlin programming languages.

• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.• Effective
communication and teamwork abilities.

• Experienced with Agile practice. At minimum must have experience working as
squad member in Agile project.

• Experience in using issue tracking tools (e.g., Jira) will be a Plus

• Willingness to continuously learn and adapt to new technologies, tools, and
industry trends

title: AI Strategy & Innovation Specialist (DGADB07)
content:
## **คุณสมบัติ**

  * ปริญญาโทหรือเอกในสาขาวิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ สถิติ วิศวกรรม หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง

**ประสบการณ์ทำงาน**

  * มีประสบการณ์ในการการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลหรือวิจัยในด้าน AI อย่างน้อย 2 ปี
  * มีประสบการณ์ในการบริหารจัดการโปรเจกต์ AI รวมถึงการกำหนดไทม์ไลน์และจัดลำดับความสำคัญของงานเพื่อให้โครงการเสร็จตามกำหนดเวลา

**ความสามารถเฉพาะทาง**

  * **ทักษะด้านโปรแกรมมิ่ง:** มีความรู้พื้นฐานในภาษาโปรแกรม เช่น Python หรือ R เพื่อช่วยในการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล
  * **ทักษะด้าน Machine Learning:** ควรมีความรู้ ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับอัลกอริธึมต่าง ๆ เช่น Regression, Classification, Clustering และ Deep Learning
  * **ทักษะด้านสถิติ:** ความเข้าใจในสถิติและความสามารถในการใช้เครื่องมือวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล (A**nalytical Tools) เช่น SQL, Pandas, และ Matplotlib**
  * **ทักษะการสื่อสาร:** สามารถสื่อสารข้อมูลทางเทคนิคให้กับผู้ที่ไม่ใช่ผู้เชี่ยวชาญได้อย่างชัดเจน

**ความสามารถพิเศษ**

  * **ทักษะการสื่อสาร:** สามารถอธิบายแนวคิดทางเทคนิคให้กับผู้ที่ไม่ใช่ผู้เชี่ยวชาญได้อย่างชัดเจน ความสามารถในการสื่อสารข้อมูลและข้อเท็จจริงอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ โดยเฉพาะเมื่อทำงานร่วมกับทีมข้ามสายงาน
  * **ทักษะด้านจริยธรรม:** AI Ethics ความเข้าใจในแนวปฏิบัติทางจริยธรรมที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ AI รวมถึงการลดความอคติในโมเดล AI เพื่อให้เกิดความยุติธรรมและโปร่งใส
  * **ทักษะการคิดเชิงวิพากษ์:** ความสามารถในการคิดวิเคราะห์และแก้ปัญหาอย่างสร้างสรรค์ โดยสามารถแยกปัญหาออกเป็นส่วน ๆ และหาวิธีแก้ไขได้อย่างมีเหตุผล
  * **ทักษะการแก้ปัญหา (Problem-Solving Skills)** ความสามารถในการหาทางออกสำหรับปัญหาที่ซับซ้อน โดยใช้แนวทางเชิงวิทยาศาสตร์และการทดลองเพื่อพัฒนาโซลูชันที่มีประสิทธิภาพ

##

## หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ

  * การวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล: รวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลขนาดใหญ่เพื่อสร้างข้อมูลเชิงลึกที่สามารถนำไปใช้ในการตัดสินใจทางธุรกิจ.
  * การวิจัยเทคโนโลยี AI: ศึกษาและติดตามแนวโน้มล่าสุดในด้านปัญญาประดิษฐ์ รวมถึงการค้นคว้าเกี่ยวกับอัลกอริธึมใหม่ ๆ และเทคนิคการเรียนรู้ของเครื่อง (Machine Learning) ที่สามารถนำไปประยุกต์ใช้ในองค์กร.
  * การสร้างรายงาน: จัดทำรายงานการวิจัยและการวิเคราะห์ที่ชัดเจนและเข้าใจง่าย เพื่อสื่อสารผลลัพธ์ให้กับผู้บริหารและทีมงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง.
  * การทำงานร่วมกับทีม: ทำงานร่วมกับนักวิทยาศาสตร์ข้อมูล (Data Scientists) และนักพัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์ (Software Developers) เพื่อให้แน่ใจว่าข้อมูลและผลการวิจัยสามารถนำไปใช้ในการพัฒนาโซลูชัน AI ได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ.
  * การทดลองและประเมินผล: ออกแบบและดำเนินการทดลองเพื่อทดสอบแนวคิดใหม่ ๆ และประเมินประสิทธิภาพของเทคโนโลยี AI ที่มีอยู่

##

title: React Native Developer
content:
**Introduction**

We are looking for a React Native Developer to join our agile development
team.

**Responsibilities**

  * Help maintain and develop mobile apps for Android and iOS based on React Native with Redux
  * Some familiarity with declarative or functional composition and design with immutable data structures
  * Some experience with UI/UX design for mobile applications
  * Must have some ability to do unit-testing with type checking for stability and robustness
  * Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
  * Assist senior developers in various tasks to maintain our apps

**Requirements**

  * BS/MS degree in Computer Science or similar major
  * 2+ years experience in mobile application development
  * 2+ years experience in JavaScript, React.js, React Native, Redux and/or RTK, Git & Firebase
  * Self-motivated and eager to learn
  * Fluent in English

**Benefits**

As a new member, you will receive huge support from the team. We are open to
new ideas, feedback and respect each other's opinions. Together, we will find
the best solutions to reach the goals we set for our team and the whole
company.

You will get:

  * 13 Thai national holidays
  * 17 personal holidays
  * Thailand visa & work permit
  * Private health insurance, social security, and yearly influenza vaccine (if in Thailand)
  * Annual health checkup reimbursement
  * Employee Assistance Program (EAP) with access to therapy sessions
  * Wellness reimbursement (Gym/yoga/massage/etc.)
  * Coworking space reimbursement for remote employees
  * The possibility of home office, remote work, and work & travel
  * Casual and friendly work environment, t-shirts and jeans are welcome
  * Regular workshops for on the job learning and training
  * Regular team events & outings
  * Annual company trip
  * Free coffee, food & snacks
  * And more!

**How To Apply**

**Visit the following page to apply -
https://ling.jobs.personio.com/job/1498683?language=en &display=en**

As part of the application process, we would like you to record a brief
2-minute video introduction to help us get to know you better.

Please include the following in your video:

  * A brief introduction of yourself - name, background, and a few personal details
  * Why you’re interested in this position
  * A highlight of your relevant skills or experience that make you a great fit for the role
  * (Optional) Any personal interests or passions that help us understand who you are

Uploading your video:

  * Once your video is ready, please upload it to Google Drive
  * Ensure anyone can view the video via the Google Drive link
  * Paste the link to your video into the application form

**About us**

Founded in 2016, Ling is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in the
world. Our mission is simple: we want to unite the world by connecting people
from different cultures. That's why our team developed the Ling app - a
language learning app focused on offering high-quality lesson content for
Asian and Eastern European languages.

title: Programmer
content:
**About the role**  
  
Thai Parkerizing Co., Ltd. is a leading manufacturer of surface treatment
solutions for the automotive industry. With over 45 years of experience, we
are committed to innovation and excellence. Join our team of professionals
dedicated to driving success and creating a sustainable future.

**What you'll be doing**

As a Programmer, you will be responsible for the following:

  1. **Implement and develop Program:** You will design for develop program as requirement and optimize business operations.
  2. **Understanding and Analyzing Business Requirements:** You will collaborate with various teams to gather and analyze business needs and translate them into technical solutions.
  3. **Creating Program Mock-Ups:** You will develop detailed program mock-ups and prototypes based on the defined business requirements, ensuring alignment with project goals.
  4. **Developing Additional Solutions as Requested:** You will be tasked with developing software solutions and enhancements as per specific business or project requests, ensuring high-quality delivery.

In addition, you will work closely with cross-functional teams, continuously
improve workflows, and contribute to the overall growth and success of the
company’s technology initiatives.

**What we're looking for**

  * **Education:** Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  * **Experience:** Minimum of 3 years as a Programmer or Software Developer.
  * **Technical Skills:**
    * Proficiency in one or more programming languages, such as ABAP, Java, CSS, DB-SQL, or HTML or any languages base on ERP, Web Application
    * Strong knowledge of web development technologies, databases, and software design patterns.
    * Expertise in Oracle/MSSQL (Microsoft SQL Server).
    * Experience in Back-End, Front-End, and Full-Stack development.
  * **Problem-Solving:** Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
  * **Teamwork:** Effective communication and collaboration abilities.
  * **Self-Management:** Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks effectively, and meet deadlines.

**What we offer**  
At Thai Parkerizing Co., Ltd., we prioritize our employees' growth and well-
being. We provide a supportive and rewarding work environment, competitive
compensation, and ample opportunities for career advancement. Our
comprehensive benefits are designed to support your personal and professional
success. Join us and contribute to our ongoing journey of excellence!

If you are interested in this exciting opportunity, please apply now.

title: Middle/Senior Developer
content:
Here at BatchLine, our primary goal is to develop software solutions that help
the pharmaceutical industry keep up with the fast pace and high efficiency of
Industry 4.0. We are currently seeking an experienced Middle/Senior Software
Developer (C#/TypeScript) to join our agile development team and help us
modernize the entire industry with the most cutting-edge technology available.
As a Middle/Senior Software Developer, you will be responsible for developing
and maintaining our cloud-native solution, contributing to quality by design,
and improving the team's technical excellence by implementing the best
software practices and technology. If you have a solid background in full-
stack software development using C#/TypeScript and are familiar with working
in an agile environment, we would love to speak with you.

**What You’ll Do:**

  * Work as part of a cross-functional Scrum development team, collaborating with product owner, domain experts and stakeholders as a representative of good software engineering practices.
  * Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
  * Build and maintain our solutions using the best design patterns and software architecture, ensuring quality-by-design.
  * Contribute to the team's technical excellence by researching and introducing new technology to the team with proof-of-concept, staying up-to-date with emerging design trends and technologies.
  * Implement and maintain test-driven development practices, collaborating with QAs to implement high quality features.
  * Collaborate with our DevOps engineers to continuously develop and apply better SDLC processes, continuously improving our technical excellence.
  * Identify technical debts and provide creative solutions to address them, collaborating with developers to implement effective solutions.
  * Analyze and monitor software performance metrics to solve performance issues.
  * Participate in Scrum ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives.
  * Always be on the lookout for team collaboration issues and proactively solve the problems.
  * Constantly observe for team knowledge gaps and initiate technical coaching.
  * Be responsible for keeping technical discussions smooth and efficient.

**What You Have:**

  * A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
  * Experience as a full-stack software developer or in a similar role using either C# or TypeScript.
  * Strong knowledge of web application development (Experience using ASP.NET, JavaScript frameworks, and working with CI/CD would be a plus).
  * Proficiency with git and git workflows.
  * Working knowledge of software design patterns and coding best practices.
  * Good knowledge of public cloud (Azure and/or AWS would be a plus).
  * Experience working in an Agile development environment, including experience working as part of a Scrum team.
  * Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
  * A problem-solving attitude.
  * A collaborative team spirit.

**What we offer :**

  * Competitive Salary and Increment every year
  * 5 day work week and 12 day vacations
  * Fixed Bonus
  * Transportation Allowance
  * Provident Fund 3 - 15%
  * Medical Insurance and Annual Medical Check-up
  * Educational Assistance and Financial Assistance
  * Annual Outing, New Year Party, and Team Building Activities
  * Birthday Gift/Celebration
  * Anniversary Benefit
  * Flexible work from home/office

**Location:** BTS Saladang

title: C#.NET Developer
content:
_**C#.NET Developer**_

 _**Contract staff for 6 months renewable**_

**Responsibilities**

  * Build new systems and maintain existing applications .NET 4.0 / ASP.NET / VB.NET / C#.NET / SQL Server 2008 or 2012 / MVC /WCF Web Services / WCF Data Services.
  * Coordinates with the Lead Developer / Senior Developer
  * Provides technology estimates and makes sure that work is completed within the estimated time;
  * Makes sure that the quality of work is very satisfactory within a given deadline;
  * Investigates and recommends solutions for technical issues as assigned/requested;
  * Responsible to write simple to complex programming codes;
  * Performs any other tasks required by management from time to time (e.g. conduct brown bag, create proof of concept, perform code review)

**Qualifications & Skills:**

**Education**

  * Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering/Science, Information Technology, or its equivalent

Experience

  * 2-3 years of programming experience using ASP.NET/VB.NET/C#.NET.
  * 2-3 years T-SQL experience
  * 2-3 years experience with SQL Server (2008/2012 preferred).
  * Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and computer science foundations, such as memory management and low-level algorithm performance.
  * Deep knowledge of the .NET 3.5/4.0/4.5 Framework, including Visual Studio 2008, VB.NET, ASP.NET, MVC, ASMX and WCF Web Services, and ADO.NET.
  * Strong knowledge of software implementation best practices.
  * Strong experience designing and working with n-tier architectures (UI, Business Logic Layer, Data Access Layer) along with some experience with service-oriented architectures (SOA).
  * Ability to design and optimize SQL Server 2008/2012 stored procedures.
  * Experience with jQuery/ HTML 5 or similar technologies.
  * Experience with JSON is an advantage.
  * Experience with Payment Gateways, e-Commerce, Insurance or Financial Systems (not required but is preferable)
  * Ability to adapt quickly to an existing, complex environment and to quickly learn new concepts and software is necessary.
  * Candidate should be a self-motivated, independent, detail-oriented, responsible team player with exceptional relationship management skills.
  * Passionate about building high-quality systems with software implementation best practices

title: Programmer
content:
สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : กรุงเทพมหานคร(เขตวัฒนา)

สาขาอาชีพหลัก : ไอที สาขาอาชีพรอง : Programmer/Developer

รูปแบบงาน : งานประจำ

ระดับตำแหน่งงาน : เจ้าหน้าที่

จำนวนที่รับ : 1 ตำแหน่ง

เงินเดือน(บาท) : ตามตกลง

วันทำงาน : จันทร์-ศุกร์

วันหยุด : วันเสาร์, วันอาทิตย์

เวลาทำงาน : 08:00 - 17:00

เวลาทำงานอื่นๆ : ไม่ระบุ

**หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ**

  * พัฒนาโปรแกรมทั้งบน Web Based Platform และ Windows Based Platform ได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ทำงานได้ถูกต้องตามงานที่ได้รับมอบหมาย หรือตาม Specifications ฝึกอบรมการใช้งาน Application Software ให้ผู้ใช้งาน และ จัดทำเอกสารคู่มือการใช้งานระบบ ร่วมกับผู้เชี่ยชาญ และ สนับสนุนระบบ (Application Specialist) หรือ Vendors จัดทำเอกสาร Data Flow Diagram (DFD), Process Description, ER Diagram และ Data Dictionary เพื่อส่งมอบเป็นคู่มือให้กับทีมงาน บำรุงดูแลรักษาระบบ พร้อมทั้ง แก้ปัญหาซอฟแวร์ ที่เกิดขึ้นระหว่างใช้งาน รายงานผลการปฏิบัติงาน ปัญหาที่พบ และแนวทางแก้ไข ให้ผู้บังคับบัญชาทราบอย่างสม่ำเสมอ

**คุณสมบัติ**

ระดับการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี ขึ้นไป

ประสบการณ์(ปี) : 2ปีขึ้นไป  
**คุณสมบัติด้านความรู้และความสามารถ**

  * วุฒิปริญญาตรี สาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง
  * มีประสบการณ์ด้านการเขียนโปรแกรม ไม่ต่ำกว่า 2 ปีขึ้นไป
  * สามารถใช้ภาษา C#, ASP.NET, PHP, JavaScript, Ajax, jQuery, Bootstrap, CSS, HTML ได้เป็นอย่างดี
  * มีความรู้พื้นฐานในการใช้งาน Internet Information Service (IIS), Apacha หรือ XAMPP อย่างใดอย่างหนึ่ง
  * มีความเข้าใจเรื่อง Data Structure, Relationship Database ทั้ง SQL Server, Mysql รวมไปถึงการเขียนภาษา SQL Script, Store Procedure, Triger, Function ได้เป็นอย่างดี
  * มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในหลักการของ RESTful API และสามารถเขียน Authorization การใช้ API เบื้องต้นได้
  * สามารถบริการจัดการงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายได้ทันตามกำหนดอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ที่ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ และ ชอบที่จะเรียนรู้เทคโนโลยีใหม่ ๆ พร้อมนำมาปรับใช้ในองค์กร

**สวัสดิการ**

  * ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน
  * ประกันสังคม

**สวัสดิการอื่นๆ**

\- ประกันสังคม  
\- กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ  
\- ค่ารักษาพยาบาล  
\- โบนัสตามผลประกอบการและผลการปฏิบัติงาน  
\- ตรวขสุขภาพประจำปี  
\- เงินช่วยเหลืองานแต่ง,งานบวช,งานศพ  
\- ท่องเที่ยวประจำปี  
\- งานเลี้ยงประจำปี  
\- วันลาพักร้อน 7-10 วัน

**สนใจสมัครงานตำแหน่งงานนี้กรุณาติดต่อ**

ชื่อผู้ติดต่อ : เจ้าหน้าที่สรรหา

เบอร์ผู้ติดต่อ : 0626982640

**ข้อมูลการติดต่อบริษัท**

80/1 ถนนสุขุมวิท 21 แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา แขวงคลองเตยเหนือ เขตวัฒนา

title: Open Source IoT Expert
content:
We are a forward-thinking company specializing in professional measurement
equipment. Our mission is to leverage the power of open-source technologies to
drive innovation on the Internet of Things (IoT) space, enhancing
connectivity, improving efficiency, and delivering exceptional value to our
clients.  

  
Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and passionate Open Source IoT Expert to join
our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing,
developing, and implementing IoT solutions using open-source technologies,
specifically tailored for professional measurement equipment. You will
collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration and
optimal performance of our IoT systems.  
  
Key Responsibilities:  
\- Design and develop IoT solutions using open-source technologies for
professional measurement equipment.  
\- Collaborate with hardware and software teams to integrate IoT devices and
systems.  
\- Ensure the security and scalability of IoT solutions.  
\- Stay up to date with the latest trends and advancements in the IoT and
open-source communities.  
\- Provide technical guidance and support to team members and clients.  

Why Join Us:  
\- Opportunity to work on innovative projects with a talented team.  
\- Competitive salary and benefits package.  
\- Flexible working hours and remote work options.  
\- Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.  
\- A supportive and inclusive work environment.  
\- Work four days a week, 32 hours per week.  
\- Five weeks of paid vacation.

Qualifications:  
\- Proven experience in developing IoT solutions using open-source
technologies.  
\- Strong knowledge of IoT protocols, platforms, and frameworks.  
\- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, C++, or JavaScript.  
\- Experience with cloud platforms and services (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google
Cloud).  
\- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.  
\- Strong communication and collaboration skills.

If you are passionate about embedded software development and are looking for
new challenges in a collaborative environment, please send us your resume and
a cover letter detailing your relevant experiences and projects.

title: DevOps Engineer
content:
**Job Description:**

  * Service Delivery Performance: Support outstanding service delivery.
  * Infrastructure & CI/CD: Design, build, and maintain infrastructure and tools for continuous integration, deployment, and monitoring.
  * Project Management: Manage SLA targets, ensure prompt issue resolution with corrective and preventive actions.
  * Agile Delivery: Mitigate impediments, ensure sprint/release success, and maintain complete artefacts for development.
  * Project Artefacts: Create PRs, RFPs, PIDs, Business/Functional Requirements, Use Cases, Flow Charts, etc.
  * Workshops & Stakeholders: Facilitate sessions to gather requirements and define deliverables.
  * Testing & Review: Support test execution and document peer review before distribution.
  * Training & Mentorship: Train stakeholders and mentor junior team members.
  * Project Coordination: Coordinate with IT teams, ensuring timely information flow.
  * System Capacity: Provide recommendations on hardware and system capacity for future needs.

****

**Qualifications:**

  * **Education:** Bachelor's or higher in IT, Computer Science, or related fields.
  * **Experience:**
    * 2+ years in Software Development or Configuration Management across multiple projects.
    * 4+ years in DevOps solution implementation.
  * **Technical Skills:**
    * Proficient in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift) and orchestration.
    * Strong knowledge of SDLC, Linux, CI/CD, and Jenkins.
    * Experience with Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
    * Hands-on experience with configuration management (Helm, Ansible).
    * Test automation experience is a plus.
  * **Other Skills:**
    * Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
    * Solid understanding of SDLC/Agile, software development, and testing methodologies.

title: Senior Programmer
content:
**Key Responsibilities:**

  * Database Administrator มีความรู้ความสามารถในการบริหารจัดการระบบ Database (SQL Server) ให้มีความปลอดภัยและมีประสิทธิภาพ 
    * Database Design: สามารถออกแบบ Database ตามความต้องการขององค์กร
    * Maintenance: สามารถ maintain การ Update, Back up & Restore Database ให้มีประสิทธิภาพอยู่เสมอ
    * Troubleshooting: สามารถตรวจสอบและแก้ไขปัญหา Error ต่างๆที่เกิดขึ้นกับ ระบบ Database
  * Database Develop มีความรู้ความสามารถในการ Query Database (SQL Server) ให้ได้ข้อมูลที่ถูกต้องและทำงานได้รวดเร็ว
    * Implementation: สามารถจัดทำ database solutions, รวมถึง SQL queries, Procedure, Functions, Trigger
    * Collaboration: สามารถทำงานร่วมกับทีม Developerเพื่อให้ระบบ Database ทำงานร่วมกับ Application อื่นๆในองค์กร
  * กำกับดูแลการเขียนโปรแกรมทางด้าน Windows App., Web App., Mobile App.
  * มีความรู้ทางด้านระบบ ERP
  * มีความรู้ทางด้าน AI

**Qualifications:**

  * **Education:** Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  * **Experience:** มีประสบการณ์ทางด้าน Database Administration, Database Developer
  * **Skills:**
    * มีความเข้าใจเรื่อง Database Structure เป็นอย่างดี
    * VB.Net , ASP.Net (Core MVC) , C#.Net ,Flutter , Phyton
    * SQL Server , MySQL

title: Senior .NET Developer
content:
**About Us:** At SecStrike, we are on the cutting edge of cyber security
innovation. Our mission is to protect businesses from cyber threats by
developing state-of-the-art security solutions. We are a small but dynamic
team, passionate about technology and dedicated to making a difference in the
world of cyber security. Join us as we build our own unique products and
contribute to a safer digital environment.

**Job Description:** We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced
Senior .Net Core Developer to join and develop our team togather. As a key
member of our development team, you will play a crucial role in designing,
developing, and maintaining our proprietary cyber security products. This is a
unique opportunity to work in a fast-paced, agile environment and make a
significant impact on the security landscape.

**Responsibilities:**

  * Design, develop, and maintain high-quality .Net Core applications.
  * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  * Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  * Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  * Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
  * Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
  * Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies in cyber security and software development.

**Qualifications:**

  * 3+ years of experience in software development with a focus on .Net Core.
  * Strong understanding of object-oriented programming.
  * Experience with RESTful APIs and web services.
  * Proficiency in SQL and experience with database design and optimization.
  * Familiarity with front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS) is a plus.
  * Knowledge of secure coding practices and cyber security principles.
  * Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  * Ability to work independently and as part of a team in an agile environment.
  * Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

**Why Join SecStrike?**

  * Be part of a pioneering company at the forefront of cyber security innovation.
  * Work in a collaborative and supportive environment with a team of passionate professionals.
  * Opportunity to make a tangible impact on the development of cutting-edge security products.
  * Competitive salary and benefits package.
  * Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.

**How to Apply:** If you are a talented .Net Core Developer looking for an
exciting new challenge, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume
and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are the
perfect fit for SecStrike to hr@secstrike.ai  
  
SecStrike is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are
committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

title: SAP Developer (S4/HANA Developer)
content:
**Working a** t : Reignwood Park - Lamlukka (Khlong 11)

**Key Accountabilities:**

**SAP S/4HANA Development & Customization**

  * Design, develop, and implement custom solutions within the SAP S/4HANA environment.
  * Enhance existing SAP functionalities through ABAP programming and Fiori/UI5 development.
  * Configure SAP modules and integrate them with third-party applications.

**System Optimization & Performance Tuning**

  * Optimize SAP S/4HANA applications for improved performance, scalability, and efficiency.
  * Conduct system troubleshooting, debugging, and issue resolution.
  * Ensure compliance with best practices in SAP development and security standards.

**Business Process Support & Automation**

  * Collaborate with business teams to analyze and improve financial, procurement, and operational workflows.
  * Automate business processes using SAP tools such as Workflow, CDS Views, and BTP extensions.
  * Provide technical guidance to end users and key stakeholders.

**Data Management & Integration**

  * Develop and maintain SAP data models, reports, and analytics tools.
  * Integrate SAP with external systems via APIs, IDocs, and BAPIs.
  * Ensure data integrity and compliance with company policies.

**Project Implementation & Support**

  * Participate in SAP S/4HANA migration and implementation projects.
  * Conduct system testing, documentation, and user training.
  * Provide ongoing support and enhancements post-go-live.

**Candidate Qualifications:**

**Education and Experience:**

  * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  * Proven experience as an SAP Application Support Specialist or similar role.

**Technical Skills:**

  * In-depth knowledge of SAP ERP systems, including configuration, customization, and integration.
  * Proficiency in SAP modules such as Finance, Sales & Distribution, Materials Management, or others relevant to the organization.
  * Experience with system configuration, data management, and integration with other business applications.

**Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills:**

  * Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze complex business processes.
  * Ability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues effectively.

**Communication and Interpersonal Skills:**

  * Excellent communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and convey technical information to non-technical stakeholders.
  * Experience in providing training to end-users on SAP systems.

**Additional Competencies:**

  * Familiarity with SAP S/4HANA is a plus.
  * Strong project management skills to lead SAP-related initiatives.
  * Commitment to continuous learning and staying updated on the latest SAP technologies and best practices.

title: Backend Developer (Rust, Python) - Contract and Renewable
content:
**Employment Type:** Contract (start with 6 months, renewable)

**Work Arrangement** : On-site

**Work permit is not supported**

**About the role**  
We are seeking an experienced Backend Developer to join the dynamic team at
our Client's company. As a Backend Developer, you will be responsible for
designing, developing, and maintaining robust and scalable backend systems
using Rust and Python.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  * Backend Development & Support:
    * Support, maintain, and improve backend systems and services built in Rust and/or Python.
    * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand backend issues and help in debugging and resolving them.
    * Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve performance and stability issues in backend systems.
    * Optimize existing code and systems to ensure scalability, reliability, and performance
  * Development & Integration:
    * Develop and implement new backend features using Rust and/or Python.
    * Assist with the integration of third-party tools, APIs, and services.
    * Write and maintain clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
  * System Monitoring & Maintenance:
    * Monitor the performance of backend services and systems, proactively identifying and resolving potential issues.
    * Assist with regular software updates, security patches, and system upgrades.
  * Collaboration & Communication:
    * Collaborate with front-end developers, product managers, and other team members to deliver high-quality, reliable backend solutions.
    * Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and suggestions for improvements.
    * Contribute to the improvement of internal tools and processes to enhance overall team productivity.

**Required Skills:**

  * Technical Skills:
    * Strong proficiency in Rust and/or Python, with hands-on experience developing backend applications.
    * Experience with databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB) and data storage mechanisms.
    * Familiarity with API design, RESTful services, and integration techniques.
    * Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) is a plus.
    * Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
  * Problem-Solving & Troubleshooting:
    * Strong analytical skills with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex backend issues.
    * Experience in diagnosing and optimizing system performance issues.
  * Communication & Teamwork:
    * Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
    * Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
    * Experience working in agile or iterative development processes.
    * Ability to work independently and as part of a team

**Qualifications:**

  * Familiarity with database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis) and message queuing systems (e.g., **RabbitMQ** , **Kafka**) and event-driven architectures
  * Experience in a fast-paced, agile environment

to submit your application.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
content:
Responsibilities:

\- Tackle applications services under responsible areas to ensure BAU
stabilization and meet expected incident SLA and system availability level
defined per on/off peak time/period, and be able to apply workaround solutions
by modifying current source code.

\- Performs root cause analysis (RCA) by doing deep code analysis to immediate
troubleshoot issues and perform issue resolution (short term. Medium term and
long term) within incident SLA along with proactive/reactive action.

\- Perform BAU system set up, bug fixing & small CRs with IT implementation
methodology (build, test, deploy) aligned to company security and business
objectives and strategy.

\- Manage regular system patch upgrade with product owner & business
stakeholders.

\- Manage monitoring tools by creating scripts, robot or AI, and ensure no
business disruption.

\- Manage support workbook and control. Ensure knowledge base has been well
organized and keep up-to-date.

\- Be familiar with REST API (Syncronous Process), Message Producer/Consumer
Process (Async Process) and Batch process.

\- Be familiar with of Opensource Monitoring Tools such as ELK stack, Grafarna

\- Be familiar with Container Technology such as Docker, K8S

\- Be familiar with Cloud Technolgy such AWS, Azure and Tencent cloud.

Qualifications

\- Bachelor's in Compuyer Science or related field

\- 1-3 years in SRE or Support Engneer

\- Strong in programming (Java, Go),basic SQL, Linux/Unix Scripting, Cloud
platforms (AWS, Azure, Tencent Cloud).

\- Hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes( K8S), including deploying,
scaling, and troubleshooting.

\- Skilled in diagnosing and resolving issues quickly, with experience in root
cause analysis and incident response.

\- Knowledge of SLAs, SLOs, and automation to improve system reliability and
reduce manual intervention.

\- Good English proficiency

Location: Ramkhamhaeng (MRT Yellow)

Work Type: 1-year renewable contract

title: AI Trainer - Developers
content:
**AI Training for Developers & Coders (English/Thai Bilingual)**

  
We are seeking experienced software engineers, coders, and language experts to
be part of the artificial intelligence (AI) revolution.  
If you are an experienced software engineer, computer scientist, programmer,
or just great at solving coding challenges, with proficiency in **Thai** and
English, this may be the perfect opportunity for you.

**[Roles & Responsibilities]**  
We are seeking experienced software engineers, coders, with proficiency in
**Thai** and English to contribute to the AI revolution.  
We have partnered with organizations to train AI large language models,
helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects
typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging
with these models as they learn to code.

Example projects might include:

  * Evaluating the quality of AI-generated code, including human-readable summaries of your rationale
  * Solve coding problems, writing functional and efficient code
  * Writing robust test cases to confirm code works efficiently and effectively

No previous experience with AI necessary! You will receive detailed
instructions on what is expected of you after you complete the application and
verification process.

**[Required Qualifications]**

  * 2+ years of experience or education in a software engineering / software development role
  * Fluency in both English and **Thai** is a must.
  * Ability to articulate complex concepts in a clear and engaging manner
  * Proficiency working with one or more of the following languages:
    * Java, JavaScript, Python, C++, C, Swift, Verilo

**[Location & Duration]**

  * **Location** : Online Remote
  * **Duration** : Flexible hours (You can work whenever is best for you)

title: PHP Developer (Contract or Full Time) for Thailand, Vietnam
content:
**PHP Developer (Contract or Full Time) for Thailand, Vietnam**

SignifyCRM is looking for energetic, self-disciplined team member that will be
part of our established business software team. You should be comfortable
working with business logics, programming frameworks, quality testing, and
team communication. If this fits you, we would love to hear from you.

For Contract Position: Developers from Vietnam, Bangladesh, India are welcome
to apply. If selected, you will first work in Bangkok for some period and then
can work remotely from your home country and collaborate with team in Bangkok.
Contract also has an option to become a full time.

  
**Job Description**  
• Analyze our existing frameworks and build extended modules and features.

• Goal Oriented. Work with job scope, task breakdowns, daily scrum, and
delivery due dates.  
• Organized. Document in coding, perform unit test, and manage software
versions using Git.  
• Integration Oriented. Learning and adopting various tools including AI
programming co-pilot, platform integration, etc.

• Team Work. Learn from your team. Collaborate with your team. Support tasks
such as proof of concept, impact analysis, software release test management,
and deployment to production management.

  
**Job Requirements**

• Degree in CS, IT, MIS, Engineering, or related field.  
• Understanding SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle).

• At least 2 years in PHP programming, experiences with framework such as
Codeigniter, Laravel, SugarCRM.

• At least 1 years in JavaScript, experiences with framework such as Angular,
jQuery, Node.js.

• Knowledge of MySQL, MongoDB.

• Experience with iReport, Talend ETL, Apache and Linux will be helpful.

title: Lead Technical Product Manager (Bangkok, Hybrid) (Relocation & Visa Provided)
content:
**About Nimble**

We solve our client's most difficult business challenges through technology.
Our company partners with the most ambitious companies around the world
creating long-term impact with the work with do. If you want to grow together,
work on challenging products and enjoy using the best tools and practices,
Nimble is the right place for you!

**Our Core Values**

  * **Ownership mentality:**  
Treat our company and our clients’ business as ours taking care of the
collective interests. This, in the end, translates to personal interests
achievement through our company

  * **Dependable & Resilient:**  
We go to great lengths for our clients, they can rely on us to deliver and all
our team members are reliable and trustworthy and we don’t give up when we
face challenges.

  * **Obsession for Excellence:  
** Our delivery quality has no parallel.

  * **Courage:**  
We must have the courage to speak up, raise our concerns in a timely manner
and be able to confront the status quo with ideas by being constructive and
without holding on to hard feelings.

**What you will do**

Although each day is usually different and presents its own challenges, there
are common themes that you will face every day.

  * Monitoring and overseeing your team’s projects. Ensuring that the projects are moving as expected, the backlogs are properly managed, and the development plans are sensible.
  * Discovering new projects, understanding the pain points and users’ expectations, and defining how to approach the problems or innovations through user experience.
  * Writing user stories, managing and grooming backlogs, and planning development sprints.
  * Ensuring the quality of the products and features developed.
  * Reviewing UX/UI designs.
  * Supporting Engineering with implementation.
  * Interacting with external stakeholders, listening to and understanding their feedback while defending your product decisions.
  * Reviewing your team’s work, both internal (assets produced for Nimble) and external (assets produced for clients).
  * Supporting the sales team in assessing potential product development projects, risks, and challenges.
  * Mentoring your team members, providing support when necessary, and figuring out how to help each and every one of them grow as Product Managers.
  * Reporting and providing insights to the Chief Product Officer.
  * Participating in the definition of the Product team’s direction.
  * Supporting the recruitment efforts and participating in the hiring process.
  * Identifying and leading new initiatives.

**Job Requirements**

  * 7+ years of professional experience as a Product Manager.
  * 2+ years of experience managing other Product Managers.
  * Some software programming experience.
  * Based in Bangkok or willing to relocate to Bangkok

Product Design & Development  

  * You have a great attention to detail.
  * You are opinionated. You also keep an open mind.
  * You know UX patterns for mobile and web applications and the design language for iOS and Android (including native components).
  * You know how to adapt the level of complexity of a design to the scope and context of a project. You can anticipate technical challenges when reviewing designs.
  * You are familiar with usage and behavioral product data. You know how to obtain it (e.g., defining the right tracking), how to understand it, and how to leverage it.
  * You have the ability to quickly learn and understand new industries. You have an interest in discovering new domains often.
  * You know how to prioritize feature development in a given context to maximize the development team’s output.
  * You know how to efficiently kick off a new product development (greenfield).
  * You know how to efficiently take over the development of an existing product (brownfield).
  * You have the knowledge and experience to conceptualize entire products quickly and assess their implementation complexity. You can anticipate associated risks and mitigate them.
  * You have the product and business insights to identify and bring up new opportunities.

**People Management**  

  * You have experience leading and mentoring other Product Managers.
  * You know how to identify your team members’ strengths, how to leverage those strengths, and how to develop them further.
  * You know how to strengthen your team members’ weaknesses through mentoring and defining their growth objectives.
  * You have the ability to set a direction and objectives for your team in order to reach the company’s higher goals.
  * You have high expectations from others, and you know how to push and motivate them to deliver their best work.

**Communication**  

  * You speak English at a Business Fluency level.
  * You have great listening and cross-functional collaboration skills.
  * You are an expert at listening and communicating with stakeholders, including in difficult situations. You are comfortable handling difficult conversations, and you know how to diffuse them.
  * You have great written communication skills. You know how to write clear content and how to structure it clearly.
  * You excel at gathering requirements from clients even when the clients don’t fully know what they need just yet.
  * You are used to working closely with Engineers to see through the correct development of a digital product.

**Technical Knowledge**  

  * You can use version control systems, especially git. You are familiar with Gitflow.
  * You are familiar with CI/CD for web and mobile (all the way through publishing applications on store).
  * You understand how APIs work, and you know how to use API management, documentation, and debugging tools (e.g., Postman, Swagger, Proxyman).
  * You know how to architect data. You can create database schemas.
  * You are familiar with the differences and specificities of web vs. iOS vs. Android, and you are familiar with cross-platform applications (e.g., Flutter).

**Organization**  

  * You have excellent time management and work organization skills.
  * You can ensure that any and all product work produced by the team (e.g., backlogs, documentation, presentations) meets the level of quality that is expected of the team.
  * You can foster a learning environment amongst all the product management team members.
  * You have the experience to identify areas of improvement for the team, and you have the ownership to lead the documentation and implementation of those improvements.
  * You understand the need for processes to repeat successes. You ensure that the right processes are followed, and you also know when flexibility is required.
  * You know how to fully leverage your core Product Stack. You work smart. You understand the importance of the single source of truth idea and fight against duplicated content.

**Bonus**  

  * You have developed some web or mobile applications either on the job or as a side project (git repos links are welcome).
  * You have some infrastructure knowledge (e.g., AWS, GCP).

**Why You'll Love Working Here**

  * **You will be proud** of any product that has our name on it.
  * We are an **engineering-focused company**. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.
  * We really pay attention and care about **processes, high quality, and aesthetics**.
  * **Strong processes**. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. 
  * **The vast amount of learning resources** (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.
  * Provident Fund which allows you to save money every month and we match your monthly contributions.
  * Private medical insurance **from day one** , company care fund, and social welfare coverage.
  * Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro and large screens at the office.
  * Casual work attire for everyone.
  * Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Bangkok next to BTS Asoke and MRT Sukhumvit (Interchange 21).
  * Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.
  * Visa and work permit for foreigners. If you live abroad, we provide a relocation assistance package consisting of a plane ticket allowance and up to 2 weeks of initial accommodation.
  * 25 days of paid leaves/year (13 public holidays + 12 personal days).
  * Sabbatical month every 3 years.
  * Company outings every year.
  * And many more perks!

If you are a passionate product professional looking to make a significant
impact in a growing software development company, we would love to hear from
you.

Join us in shaping the future by elevating product innovation!

We keep our recruitment process practical and straightforward.

To learn more about how we work, check our handbook named Compass, Github
organization, and Medium account.

Want to see what we have built? Check our Dribbble and Behance accounts.

Want to keep in touch with us? Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Nimble is an equal-opportunity employer.

title: IT Development/Programmer Section Head/หัวหน้าส่วนพัฒนาระบบสารสนเทศ
content:
**รายละเอียดงานและหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ**

  * เก็บข้อมูลความต้องการของผู้ใช้งานเพื่อออกแบบและพัฒนาระบบ โดยจะต้องมีการทำ UAT และเอกสารทางด้านเทคนิคและคู่มือ

  * Customize ฟอร์มและรายงานของ Epicor ERP ตามที่ได้รับอนุมัติให้จัดทำ
  * ปรับปรุง ซอฟต์แวร์ หรือ แอปพลิเคชัน ให้คงไว้ซึ่งประสิทธิภาพ
  * การติดต่อและประสานงานกับทีมอื่นๆ เพื่อสร้างซอฟต์แวร์ หรือแอปพลิเคชันที่มีประสิทธิภาพ 

**คุณสมบัติ**

  * ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง
  * มีประสบการณ์ทางด้านพัฒนาโปรแกรมด้วยJava, Python, NET, Web application, APIs, C#
  * มีประสบการณ์ดูแล Back-end Microsoft SQL ทั้งระบบ, My SQL
  * มีประสบการณ์ทดสอบโปรแกรม Unit Testing ตาม Specification
  * มีทักษะในการใช้ภาษาคอมพิวเตอร์เพื่อพัฒนาโปรแกรมได้
  * สามารถออกแบบกระบวนการในการทำระบบซอฟต์แวร์ให้เป็นมาตรฐานสำหรับผู้ใช้งานได้
  * สามารถทดสอบ ตรวจสอบ ความถูกต้องของกระบวนการให้เป็นไปตามมาตรฐานขององค์กรได้
  * มีความรับผิดชอบต่อหน้าที่การทำงาน มีความอดทนต่อสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงาน / มี Growth Mindset

title: Full Stack Javascript Developer
content:
**Job Description**

  * Develop websites using Javascript stack such as Nodejs, Nextjs, React, Typescript, and GraphQL
  * Work in Scrum
  * Have responsibility
  * Able to switch between fullstack, frontend, and backend roles or focus on one area
  * Freedom to propose and make decisions on choosing new technologies

**Requirements**  

  * Bachelor's degree in related field, fresh graduates welcome
  * Understand and/or have experience in Typescript, React, NextJS, MongoDB, and GraphQL
  * Basic understanding of git and CI/CD
  * Love learning and keeping up with new technologies
  * Ability to learn independently
  * Able to work in a team that can adapt quickly to change

  
**Additional**  

  * University projects
  * GitHub projects available for review
  * Experience writing web applications in a professional setting is a plus
  * Fluent in English

  
**Junior Packages (0-3 years)**  

  * 30-50K depending on experience and skills
  * Macbook with 16GB RAM
  * 12 days of annual leave
  * Competitive salary
  * work on-site (no work from home or hybrid)
  * Working hours from 9:00am to 6:00pm
  * Located in Bangkok or willing to relocate to Bangkok (relocation and visa provided

**Senior Packages (5-7 years)**  

  * 70-120K depending on experience and skills
  * Macbook with 16GB RAM
  * 12 days of annual leave
  * Competitive salary
  * work on-site (no work from home or hybrid)
  * Working hours from 9:00am to 6:00pm
  * Located in Bangkok or willing to relocate to Bangkok (relocation and visa provided)
  * 

**Why are Developers important to our team(company)?**  
**A developer team can help this business in several ways:**  
Develop and maintain software applications that support the company's
operations, such as inventory management systems, production planning tools,
and customer relationship management (CRM) software.  
Build custom solutions to automate and streamline specific business processes,
such as automating the creation of purchase orders or generating reports.  
Create and maintain the company's website and online presence, including
e-commerce platforms and social media profiles.  
Develop mobile apps or other digital tools to enhance the customer experience
and make it easier for customers to interact with the company.  
Collaborate with other teams, such as the marketing team, to create digital
campaigns and marketing materials.  
Analyze data and provide insights to help the company make data-driven
decisions and optimize its operations.  
Overall, a developer team can help the business by using technology to improve
efficiency, streamline operations, and enhance the customer experience.

• จัดการเครื่องมือการเรียนรู้ที่ชาญฉลาด (Smart Learning Tools)
พัฒนาโปรแกรมหรือแอปพลิเคชันที่ใช้ในการเรียนการสอน

และผู้เชี่ยวชาญ พร้อมทั้งวางแผนงานให้ทีมที่ดูแล

• ส่งเสริมประสบการณ์เรียนรู้ที่ดี (Learner Experience)

หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง  
\- ทักษะด้านการออกแบบหลักสูตร  
\- ทักษะด้านการบริหารและประสานงาน  
\- ทักษะด้านภาษาและเทคโนโลยี

title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend or Full-Stack (NodeJS and ReactJS)
content:
**About PropertyScout:**

Starting in Thailand, we are building an end-to-end real estate technology
platform in emerging markets empowering all market participants to deliver a
trusted and seamless real estate experience. Our mission is to make the
leading property transaction platform across Southeast Asia.

We currently empower over 4,500 agents and agencies and 200+ internal agents
and are servicing thousands of satisfied buyers, tenants, and owners monthly
with our team of over 300 members.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  * Collaborate with the product team to ensure effective implementation of products.
  * Perform full lifecycle software development, from design to testing.
  * Take ownership and accountability for assigned tasks and projects.
  * Design, code, document, and test software using accepted languages and frameworks.
  * Follow established coding standards and processes.
  * Commit to delivering high-quality products to end-users.

  
**Qualifications:**

  * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
  * At least 3-5+ years of relevant work experience in software development.
  * Professional proficiency in written and verbal English.
  * Demonstrated track record in building efficient and scalable architectural solutions.
  * Strong expertise with Javascript, ECMAScript, and Typescript.
  * Strong expertise with backend technologies and Node.js runtime.
  * Strong expertise with React and frontend technologies.
  * Preferred experience with NestJS and Next.js.
  * Knowledge of design patterns, object-oriented programming (OOP), and functional programming concepts.
  * Experience with backend performance optimization.
  * Experience in handling, configuring, optimizing, and monitoring MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch.
  * Experience in test automation techniques.
  * Experience in REST and third-party API integrations.
  * Familiarity with secure software development practices.
  * Exposure to DevOps practices.
  * Exposure to collaborating tools like GitHub, JIRA, Confluence.

  
**Compensation and Benefits**

  * Competitive base salary
  * 10 days of annual leave in the first year, growing by 1 day per year to 15 days per year
  * 5 days of business leave
  * 10 - 20% Share of commission from owner and client referral
  * Health insurance on top of standard social security
  * BOI-sponsored visa & work permit for expats

  
**Work Culture**

  * International work environment and culture
  * 5 work days per week with 2 days work-from-home
  * Open communication that encourages feedback and idea-sharing
  * Innovative mindset that empowers creativity and new ideas
  * Established and defined career paths
  * Monthly Celebration & Parties

  
**Company Values**

  * Customers & Partners First
  * Integrity & Reliability

title: Oracle Developer (EBS)
content:
## **Key Responsibilities:**

System Support

  * Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to Oracle applications, databases, and integrations.
  * Monitor system performance, identify bottlenecks, and implement solutions to improve efficiency and stability.

Maintenance and Upgrades

  * Perform regular maintenance tasks, including patching, system backups, and recovery operations.
  * Implement system upgrades and enhancements, ensuring minimal disruption to business operations.
  * Collaborate with Oracle support and vendors to apply fixes, patches, and updates as needed.

Development and Customization

  * Customize Oracle applications to meet specific business needs, ensuring alignment with best practices and organizational standards.
  * Create and manage database objects, such as tables, views, indexes, and triggers, to support system requirements.

User Support and Training

  * Assist end-users with technical issues and provide training on Oracle system features and functionalities.
  * Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and coordinate with users to ensure successful implementation of system changes.  

## **Qualifications:**

Education

  * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

Experience

  * Minimum of 5 years of experience in Oracle system support, development, or a related technical role.
  * Proven experience with Oracle E-Business Suite, including support, maintenance, and customization.

Technical Skills

  * Proficiency in Oracle PL/SQL, including the ability to write and debug complex scripts and procedures.
  * Understanding of Oracle EBS architecture, modules, and integration points.  

**Location:** BTS Ekkamai  
**Working Day:** Mon-Fri

title: Senior IT Specialist
content:
**Senior IT Specialist**

**About the role**  
  
As the **Senior IT Specialist** you will be responsible for overseeing the
company's critical IT infrastructure and security systems. This full-time,
hybrid role in retail business, will see you play a pivotal part in ensuring
the smooth and secure operation of the company's technology platforms.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  * Manage and maintain the company's IT infrastructure, including servers, networking equipment, and cloud-based services
  * Implement and oversee security measures to protect the company's data and systems from cyber threats.
  * Collaborate with other department heads to align IT strategies with the company's overall business objectives
  * Design and maintain the IT infrastructure (servers, network, cloud services) to support business needs and create network policies and define authorization roles.
  * Ensures of POS and ERP systems are well-integrated, secure, and compliant, supporting smooth retail operations, accurate reporting, and efficient inventory and financial management.
  * Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies, and recommend improvements to the company's IT systems
  * Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and internal policies related to data privacy and security

**Qualifications:**

  * Extensive experience (3+ years) in a senior IT management role, preferably in retail or similar environment.
  * Proven track record in leading and managing a team of IT professionals
  * In-depth knowledge of IT infrastructure, security best practices, and emerging technologies
  * Familiar with the specific challenges of retail IT systems, including POS, stock management, ERP system and multiple locations is highly preferred.
  * Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously
  * Relevant qualifications in IT, computer science, or a related field
  * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, good command in English (written & spoken) to liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders

content:

At **Mittraphap** , we are more than a solution provider—we are your trusted
partner in achieving life goals. Rooted in a commitment to innovation and
professionalism, we craft products and services that empower financial
advisors, brokers, and planners to deliver exceptional value to their clients.
Guided by trust, connection, and sustainable growth, we aim to redefine the
insurance and financial planning experience for a brighter future together.

**Role Description**

As a **Junior Developer** , you will be responsible for **frontend
development** , including **coding, testing, and debugging** for an

knit team** , collaborating to build a **scalable and high-quality platform**

title: DevOps Engineer
content:
More than just a recruitment company. At PRTR, we have been a part of our
customer's success for 30 years as their total HR solutions partner. With 550
dedicated professionals and over 15,000 outsourced staff, we will continue to
carry out our mission to develop a better career, a better life, and a better
society, and thrive to become the No.1 people solutions organization in
Southeast Asia.  
  
As a Senior Cloud Engineer, you will be responsible for designing,
implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to
support the development, deployment, and operation of cloud-based
applications. You will be collaborating closely with development teams,
operations teams, and other stakeholders to ensure the availability,
scalability, and reliability of cloud environments.  
  
**Responsibilities:**  

  * Designing, implementing, and maintaining cloud infrastructure using best practices, focusing on scalability, performance, and security.
  * Developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines to automate software builds, testing, and deployments.
  * Implementing monitoring, alerting, and log management systems to proactively identify and resolve issues.
  * Continuously improving system performance, reliability, and security through infrastructure optimization and automation.
  * Mentoring and guiding team members and relevant parties.

**Requirements:**  

  * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant cloud certifications (e.g., AWS Certified, Azure Certified) are a plus.
  * Extensive experience in designing and implementing cloud infrastructure, preferably with one or more major cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP).
  * Proficiency in infrastructure-as-code tools such as Terraform and Ansible.
  * Strong understanding of CI/CD concepts and experience with build and deployment tools (e.g., Jenkins, ArgoCD, Git).
  * Hands-on experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration frameworks.
  * Solid understanding of networking concepts, security best practices, and experience implementing security controls in cloud environments.
  * Proficiency in scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell, Bash) for automation and infrastructure management.
  * Understanding of database infrastructure and experience in deployment and configuration (e.g., SQL, Postgres, MongoDB).
  * Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Prometheus, Zabbix, ELK stack) for application and infrastructure observability.

title: Business Intelligence (BI) Specialist
content:
**Job Summary:**

The **Business Intelligence Specialist** will be responsible for extracting,
transforming, and analyzing data from ERP systems and other data sources to
create insightful and impactful reports using Power BI. The role involves
collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather business requirements and
translating them into analytical solutions that support decision-making and
performance improvements.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  * **Data Extraction & Integration:**
    * Extract data from ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics) and other relevant databases.
    * Integrate data from multiple sources, ensuring data quality and integrity.
    * Develop and maintain ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for data pipelines.
  * **Data Analysis & Reporting:**
    * Design, develop, and maintain interactive dashboards, reports, and visualizations using **Power BI**.
    * Perform in-depth analysis of business data to identify trends, patterns, and insights.
    * Create clear and concise reports that translate complex data into actionable insights for stakeholders.
  * **Collaboration & Requirements Gathering:**
    * Work closely with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into technical specifications.
    * Collaborate with IT, finance, sales, and other departments to ensure data accuracy and relevance in reporting.
    * Provide ad-hoc analysis and reporting as required.
  * **Data Governance & Management:**
    * Ensure data governance and best practices in data management are followed.
    * Implement security measures to protect sensitive business data.
  * **Performance Monitoring & Optimization:**
    * Monitor the performance of BI tools and solutions and optimize as needed.
    * Provide regular updates and enhancements to the reporting structure based on business requirements.

**Qualifications & Skills:**

  * **Educational Background:**
    * Bachelor’s degree in **Computer Science** , **Information Systems** , **Data Analytics** , or a related field.
  * **Technical Skills:**
    * **Proficiency in Power BI** : Experience creating dynamic dashboards and reports.
    * **ERP Systems Knowledge** : Hands-on experience with ERP systems (e.g., SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics).
    * Strong knowledge of **SQL** and data querying languages for data extraction.
    * Experience with **ETL tools** (e.g., Talend, Informatica) is a plus.
    * Familiarity with **DAX (Data Analysis Expressions)** , **Power Query** , and other Power BI-specific tools.
    * Experience with cloud platforms such as **Azure** or **AWS** for data management is advantageous.
  * **Analytical Skills** :
    * Strong problem-solving skills and ability to analyze complex datasets.
    * Ability to translate data into meaningful and actionable insights for stakeholders.
  * **Soft Skills:**
    * Excellent communication and presentation skills.
    * Ability to work independently and within cross-functional teams.
    * Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work.
  * **Experience:**
    * Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in **BI development** , **data analysis** , or a related field.
    * Prior experience in a similar role with ERP data extraction is highly preferred.

  * Deploy AI models using cloud platforms, edge computing, or embedded systems.
  * Continuously research and implement state-of-the-art AI methodologies.
  * Monitor and improve model performance over time.

  * Proven experience in developing and deploying AI models.

  * **Hands-on experience with NLP, computer vision, reinforcement learning, or generative AI.**
  * **Experience working with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.**
  * Knowledge of big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka is a plus.
  * Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

  * Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control (Git), CI/CD, and API development.
