title: ETL Developer (Microsoft SQL Server)- Outsource
content:
## **Responsibilities:**

  * Develop ETL systems using Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) for extracting data from various sources, transforming it, and loading it into a data warehouse or target database.
  * Design and improve workflows to enhance efficiency and support future data growth.
  * Maintain and manage SQL Server databases, including performance tuning and data security.
  * Create and review indexes, stored procedures and views, optimize queries.
  * Monitor all job schedules within the ETL system to ensure smooth operation.
  * Responsible for tracking the status of various tasks, such as SSIS package executions, scheduled tasks, and batch jobs.
  * Provide alerts and manage issues that may arise in the scheduling process to ensure continuous and efficient system performance.
  * Develop unit tests and integration tests to ensure ETL processes are accurate and stable.
  * Identify and resolve errors in the ETL process.
  * Enhance existing ETL processes to be more flexible and adaptable to data changes.
  * Prepare system documentation and user manuals to facilitate future system maintenance.

## **Qualifications:**

  * Bachelor or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or a related filed
  * At least 2-3 years of experience in designing and developing ETL systems.
  * Having experience in Microsoft SQL Server (SSIS) will be an advantage.
  * Experience in Microsoft SQL Server, SSIS, and T-SQL.
  * Having Knowledge in Data Warehousing and Data Modeling.
  * Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
  * Able to communicate and collaborate effectively with diverse, cross-functional teams.
  * Capable of managing time and handling multiple projects simultaneously.
  * Passionate about the work and committed to continuous self-development in new technologies.
  * Proactive with the ability to propose continuous improvements to work processes.

title: Application Development Asst. Manager/ Manager
content:
This role is responsible for the holistic integrity and functionality of
technical solutions and system products. This includes setting technology
boundaries, policies, and engineering practices and standards for system
evolution and integrity. We looking for 'TALENT' responsible for creating
“just-enough” architecture, plus identifying standards and processes that
directly relate to successfully implementing the product itself. Makes sure
that no architectural, process, and standards constraints are placed on
implementation and maintenance beyond the minimum needed to build the product
correctly.

**Qualifications:**

  1. Hold Bachelor or Master degrees in Information Technology or related field
  2. Over 3 - 5 years of experience in system development. 
  3. Proficient in Frontend development, including **Vue.js** and **JavaScript**. 
  4. Strong expertise in Backend development using **ASP.NET Core**. 
  5. Skilled in using **GitHub** for version control and collaboration. 
  6. Ability to design and implement **DevOps workflows**. 
  7. Writing SQL queries to extract, analyse, and manipulate data with **SQL Server**

**Special Skills:**

  * Strategic thinking and ability to lead technical teams effectively. 
  * Strong problem-solving skills with a focus on optimizing development processes. 
  * Deep understanding of software development lifecycle and best practices. 
  * Capability to troubleshoot and resolve technical issues efficiently. 
  * Team player with strong collaboration skills. 
  * Eagerness to learn and adopt new technologies. 
  * Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work. 

**Responsibilities:**

  1. Manage and oversee the application development team to ensure project success. 
  2. Design, implement, and maintain high-quality application solutions. 
  3. Develop, test, and maintain application systems in accordance with project requirements. 
  4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align development goals with business objectives. 
  5. Ensure code quality through reviews and adherence to best practices. 
  6. Create and optimize DevOps pipelines for continuous integration and deployment. 
  7. Provide mentorship and technical guidance to the development team. 
  8. Support the team by sharing knowledge and contributing to skill-building. 
  9. Assist in optimizing workflows and improving system performance. 

**Preferred Attributes:**

  * Strong leadership and communication skills. 
  * Highly organized and detail-oriented. 
  * Proactive and adaptive to new technologies.

title: Full Stack Developer Associate/ Senior Associate
content:
**Job Summary:**

We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated **Full Stack Developer** to join
our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have experience in both frontend
and backend development, with a solid understanding of modern frameworks,
cloud technologies, and best development practices. You'll be responsible for
designing, developing, and maintaining scalable applications that deliver
seamless user experiences.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  * Design, develop, and maintain scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications.
  * Develop frontend interfaces using frameworks like **React** , **Angular** , or **Vue.js**.
  * Build and maintain backend services using **Node.js** , **Python (Django/Flask)** , **Java (Spring Boot)** , or similar technologies.
  * Create and manage RESTful APIs and work with **GraphQL** as needed.
  * Ensure cross-platform optimization for mobile devices and responsiveness across browsers.
  * Work with **databases** such as **MySQL** , **PostgreSQL** , **MongoDB** , etc.
  * Integrate third-party APIs and services.
  * Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers to deliver high-quality products on time.
  * Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices.
  * Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging.
  * Deploy and manage applications using **CI/CD pipelines** and cloud platforms like **AWS** , **Azure** , or **Google Cloud**.
  * Stay updated with emerging trends and technologies in software development.

**Required Skills and Qualifications:**

  * **Bachelor’s degree** in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
  * **2+ years** of experience as a Full Stack Developer or in a similar role.
  * Proficiency in **frontend technologies** : HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), and modern frameworks (**React** , **Angular** , or **Vue.js**).
  * Strong understanding of **backend technologies** : **Node.js** , **Express.js** , **Python** , **Java** , **PHP** , or similar.
  * Experience with **databases** : relational (e.g., **MySQL** , **PostgreSQL**) and NoSQL (e.g., **MongoDB**).
  * Familiarity with **version control systems** like **Git**.
  * Understanding of **RESTful APIs**
  * Knowledge of **containerization** and **orchestration tools** like **Docker** and **Kubernetes**.
  * Experience with **cloud services** (AWS, Azure, GCP).
  * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  * Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

title: Software Engineer
content:
**About us**

At ExxonMobil, our vision is to lead in energy innovations that advance modern
living and a net-zero future. As one of the world’s largest publicly traded
energy and chemical companies, we are powered by a unique and diverse
workforce fueled by the pride in what we do and what we stand for.

The success of our Upstream, Product Solutions and Low Carbon Solutions
businesses is the result of the talent, curiosity and drive of our people.
They bring solutions every day to optimize our strategy in energy, chemicals,
lubricants and lower-emissions technologies.

We invite you to bring **your** ideas to ExxonMobil to help create sustainable
solutions that improve quality of life and meet society’s evolving needs.
Learn more about our **What** and our **Why** and how we can work **together**

**ExxonMobil Limited (EML)**

Aside from the Bangkok Global Business Center which is one of the largest
Global Business Center in ExxonMobil Global Business Centers network,
ExxonMobil Limited is part of ExxonMobil's organization – ranging from Product
Solutions, Supply Chain and Global Trading to Global Business Solutions, and
Technology & Engineering. We provide high-value strategic solutions and
services for ExxonMobil affiliates and customers in over 60 countries.

Career development is a high priority at ExxonMobil Limited. Our approach is
based on long-term career orientation and development from within our global
organization.

We’re looking for graduates and experienced professionals who are eager to
take on these opportunities with us.

## **Core Value**

We are looking for candidates who align with our core values:

  * Integrity: Be honest and ethical | Do what is right
  * Excellence: Hold ourselves to high standards | Be thoughtful, thorough, and disciplined
  * Care: Be respectful and inclusive | Look after each other | Contribute to the well-being of our communities and the environment
  * Courage: Take initiative and make a difference | Think boldly and act with conviction | Take personal ownership
  * Resilience: Be determined and persevere | Be purposeful and steadfast in our principles

## **What you will do**

  * Develop, unit test, and maintain software applications.
  * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  * Write clean, scalable, and efficient code.
  * Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.
  * Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.

## **About you:**

**Skills and Qualifications**

  * Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or IT-related fields
  * Fluent in English: TOEIC 750+, TOEFL iBT 98+, or IELTS 6.5+
  * Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, C++, or JavaScript.
  * Experience with software development frameworks and tools (e.g., Spring, Django, React).
  * Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  * Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.

## **Mandatory documents:**

**Please upload additional documents to faster screening process:

  * English language (TOEIC, TOEFL, IELTS) – Score with over 2 years is valid to upload
  * Education Transcript, Certificates - both Bachelor’s and Master’s Degree (if any)
  * Military Documents ( สด.8 หรือ สด. 43 ) – for male only

## **Your benefits**

**An ExxonMobil career is one designed to last. Our commitment to you runs
deep: our employees grow personally and professionally, with benefits built on
our core categories of health, security, finance, and life.**

We offer you:

  * Competitive benefits and compensation
  * Premium medical health plan & life insurance
    * Full coverage OPD (for actual reasonable amount necessary for treatment)
    * Limit out-of- pocket for IPD
    * Dental fee coverage
  * Annual medical check-up
  * Provident fund contribution rate 5% to 15% of salary
  * Contribution 5% of salary to employee savings plan
  * Housing loan subsidy
  * Workplace flexibility
  * 10 to 20 days annual vacation
  * 5 days personal business leave Special occasion leaves e.g. Birthday, Wedding or Graduation
  * Skills training & development program
  * Tuition assistance

*Eligibility and details may vary according to work location, service year and conditions in each program/plan.

Please note benefits may be changed from time to time without notice, subject
to the direction and discretion of the Company and/or applicable law.

## **Application Process**

 _Please be informed that only shortlisted candidates will be notified, and
you can find out more about our hiring process**here**._

_For more information about business solicitation and recruiting scams, please
click**here**._

_We thank you for your interest in ExxonMobil.”_

## **Stay connected with us**

Learn more at our **website**

Follow us on**LinkedIn and X**

Like us on **Facebook**

Subscribe our channel at **YouTube**

## **Equal Opportunity Employer**

**ExxonMobil is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will
receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion,
age, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, citizenship status,
protected veteran status, genetic information, or physical or mental
disability**

## **Corporate Separateness Statement**

Nothing herein is intended to override the corporate separateness of local
entities. Working relationships discussed herein do not necessarily represent
a reporting connection, but may reflect a functional guidance, stewardship, or
service relationship.

Exxon Mobil Corporation has numerous affiliates, many with names that include
ExxonMobil, Exxon, Esso and Mobil. For convenience and simplicity, those terms
and terms like corporation, company, our, we and its are sometimes used as
abbreviated references to specific affiliates or affiliate groups. Abbreviated
references describing global or regional operational organizations and global
or regional business lines are also sometimes used for convenience and
simplicity. Similarly, ExxonMobil has business relationships with thousands of
customers, suppliers, governments, and others. For convenience and simplicity,
words like venture, joint venture, partnership, co-venturer, and partner are
used to indicate business relationships involving common activities and
interests, and those words may not indicate precise legal relationships

title: นักพัฒนาซอฟแวร์ (Developer)
content:
**รายละเอียดของงาน**

1\. **การพัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์และแอปพลิเคชัน**

**-** พัฒนาและปรับปรุงซอฟต์แวร์และแอปพลิเคชันต่าง ๆ
เพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้าหรือภารกิจขององค์กร

2\. **การทดสอบและปรับปรุง**

**-** ทดสอบซอฟต์แวร์เพื่อตรวจสอบความถูกต้องและประสิทธิภาพ และปรับปรุงตาม
feedback และความต้องการ

3\. **การวิเคราะห์และออกแบบ**

**-** วิเคราะห์ความต้องการของระบบ
ออกแบบโครงสร้างและฟังก์ชันของซอฟต์แวร์เพื่อให้ตรงตามความต้องการของลูกค้าหรือองค์กร

4\. **การรักษาและดูแลระบบ**

**-** ดูแลและรักษาซอฟต์แวร์และระบบให้ทำงานอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพและเสถียร

5\. **การพัฒนาเทคโนโลยี**

**-** ติดตามและศึกษาเทคโนโลยีใหม่ ๆ
เพื่อพัฒนาทักษะและเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงาน

**เป้าหมายของการทำงาน**

**สร้างซอฟต์แวร์และแอปพลิเคชันที่มีคุณภาพ**

**-**
พัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์และแอปพลิเคชันที่มีประสิทธิภาพและใช้งานได้ตามความต้องการของลูกค้า

**ปรับปรุงซอฟต์แวร์และแอปพลิเคชันที่มีคุณภาพ**

**-** มีการทดสอบระบบก่อนใช้งาน
เพื่อลดข้อผิดพลาดที่จะเกิดขึ้นและได้ตามความต้องการของลูกค้า

**ออกแบบโครงสร้างและฟังก์ชันของซอฟต์แวร์**

**-**
พัฒนากระบวนการการทำงานและแสดงฟังก์ชันของซอฟต์แวร์ให้เหมาะสมกับความต้องการของผู้ใช้

**การรักษาและดูแลระบบซอฟต์แวร์**

**-** ให้ระบบทำงานอย่างมีความเสถียร
โดยลดปัญหาและข้อผิดพลาดในการทำงานของระบบให้น้อยที่สุด

**การพัฒนาทักษะ**

**-**
พัฒนาทักษะและความรู้ในด้านเทคโนโลยีและการพัฒนาระบบเพื่อเติบโตและพัฒนาตนเองในองค์กร

**คุณสมบัติของตำแหน่ง Developer**

การศึกษา:

  * **ปริญญาตรีหรือสูงกว่า** ในสาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ (Computer Science), วิศวกรรมซอฟต์แวร์ (Software Engineering), เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ (Information Technology) หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง

ประสบการณ์:

  * **ประสบการณ์การทำงานอย่างน้อย 2-5 ปี** ในการพัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์และแอปพลิเคชัน
  * **ทักษะการเขียนโปรแกรม** ในภาษาต่าง ๆ เช่น C#,J#, Java Script ES6, IIS/OOP, MSSQL-ORACLE, Crystal Report หรืออื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการขององค์กร

ทักษะส่วนบุคคล:

  * **ทักษะการแก้ปัญหา** และการวิเคราะห์ที่ดี
  * **การสื่อสารและการทำงานเป็นทีม** ได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ
  * **ความคิดสร้างสรรค์** และความสามารถในการนำเสนอไอเดียใหม่ ๆ
  * **ความสามารถในการเรียนรู้และปรับตัว** ตามเทคโนโลยีใหม่ ๆ

title: Frontend Developer (Welcome new graduated)
content:
**Frontend Developer Position:**  
  
We are looking for a junior developer to join our experienced development
team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, coding, testing,
modifying, and implementing new or existing software products.

Responsibilities

  * Develop user-facing features using the React framework
  * Write reusable, maintainable, and efficient code
  * Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and responsiveness
  * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve project objectives
  * Stay informed about emerging technologies and industry best practices

Skills and Qualifications

Required Skills

  * Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript or TypeScript
  * Hands-on experience with React.js, React-native and its ecosystem
  * Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git
  * Experience working with RESTful APIs and integrating web services
  * Ability to learn new technologies independently and adapt quickly
  * Proficiency in reading and understanding English documentation

**It’s Great if You Have**

Knowledge in NoSQL, Queueing systems (Kafka, MongoDB).

  * Accident Insurance

You can study the details about the processing of personal data of applicants
at
https://www.maxbit.co.th/public/c0a6b7e66495d637f447f7f1bdf9e250/documents/Privacy_Notice/Maxbit_Candidate_Privacy_Notice.pdf.

title: Teacher of Design and Technology
content:
**The Beginning of a Great Heart**  
**The School:**  

King’s College International School Bangkok is a King’s College School
Wimbledon International School. We opened in September 2020 for boys and girls
and now cater for over 1,500 students aged 2 –18 in Early Years to Year 13,
offering IGCSEs, A levels and pathways to the world’s best universities.

We work closely with King’s Wimbledon to provide a well-structured education
that aims to instil a love of learning, creativity and independence in our
students. Our vision is to engage, inspire and extend our students. We want
our alumni to be successful in their own ways. We do this with the values of
kindness, good manners and wisdom in a friendly, welcoming and attractive
environment.

We are looking for outstanding teachers who embody our values, can inspire
students and who understand the values of a UK-style education.

We really value our teachers and we recruit the best. To help us do this, we
offer an excellent package of international benefits including annual flight
allowance, medical insurance, housing allowance, a competitive salary and
places in school for up to two children subject to our admissions process.

**The Position:**  

The school wishes to appoint a dedicated, well-qualified **Teacher of Design
and Technology** to develop and deliver an outstanding learning experience for
our students. They will have a focus on student-centred learning such as
practical work and have a strong subject knowledge to engage, inspire and
extend the students.

We are seeking an energetic and creative individual to teach Design and
Technology to 11-18 year old students, with experience teaching GCSE and A
Level courses. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering
engaging, hands-on lessons that inspire students to develop their creativity
and practical skills.

Our aim is to nurture the creative potential of all students, and to cultivate
an enthusiasm for Design and Technology that extends beyond the classroom. We
hope that the experiences and skills our students gain in Design and
Technology will encourage them to pursue careers in design and engineering
after they graduate.

Since 2020 we have grown rapidly and this is an exciting opportunity for a
candidate who will inspire, set the highest of standards and build systems to
ensure that as we continue to grow we set the scene for future excellence.

This position will also play an active role in the co-curricular and pastoral
aspects of the school with the opportunity of being a form tutor for the right
candidate.

If you value colleagues who will support you, you are excited by a new school
environment in which we all work hard for each other, and if you have a
nurturing approach to education we would welcome your application for a
position with us.

**Applications**  

A full application form and cover letter, along with an accompanying CV in
support of your application should be sent through the TES portal. Incomplete
applications will not be considered.

Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted

**Important Note**  

King’s College International School Bangkok is fully committed to safeguarding
and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff to share this
commitment. Any offer of employment will be subject to the receipt of an
enhanced DBS disclosure/ICPC, a criminal records check, suitably translated if
you teach outside of the UK, satisfactory references, and medical clearance.

Further details can be found on our school website at www.kingsbangkok.ac.th

**How We Use Your Information**  

We will use the information which you have provided on this form, and which we
collect from other sources (such as from references and from the Disclosure
and Barring Services) for the following purposes: to assess your suitability
for the role for which you have applied, to assess your suitability to work
with children and to enable us to comply with our legal obligations (including
safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people). Should
you be appointed to the role, we may also use the data regarding your degree
and professional qualifications on staff lists on our website or in our
marketing material.

Further information on how the school uses personal data is set out in the in
the school’s Privacy Notice for Staff, which can be found on our website.

title: Backend Developer
content:
**Job Descriptions:**

  * Developing applications in accordance with life cycle software development.
  * Participating with requirement gathering and requirement analysis with advice and/or recommendation.
  * Clearly understanding all system requirements, in term of flow, workflow, data, platform, and technology that need for development.
  * Reviewing and analyzing needs and product requirements with suggestion (if needed) to create a completed system structure design.
  * Preparing development methodology/process that fit to designed system.
  * Identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system.
  * Determining how a system should work and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect outcomes.

**Qualifications:**

  * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, MIS, IT, or related fields.
  * Thai native speaker.
  * At least experience 3 years in Developer, Software Engineer, or related fields.
  * Proficient understanding of programming language, Python and Java is a must.
  * Proficient understanding of database, including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL.
  * Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
  * Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as GitHub/GitLab or SVN.
  * Mobile application development skill (iOS and Android) would be advantaged.

title: Senior / Junior Developer
content:

  * Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science or other IT related fields.

  * Able to code following languages: ASP, ASP.Net, C#.Net, VB.Net, PHP.

  * Integrate data from various back-end services and databases
  * Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs
  * Create and maintain software documentation
  * Be responsible for managing, expanding, and scaling our site
  * Stay plugged into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities

title: Programmer
content:
**ตำแหน่ง: Programmer**  
บริษัท เค-ซอฟท์แวร์ จำกัด
กำลังมองหาโปรแกรมเมอร์มืออาชีพเพื่อเข้าร่วมทีมพัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์ของเรา
ตำแหน่งนี้มีความสำคัญต่อการเติบโตและความสำเร็จของบริษัทเป็นอย่างมาก

**หน้าที่หลัก:**

  * วิเคราะห์ ออกแบบ และพัฒนาโปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์ตามความต้องการของลูกค้า
  * ปรับปรุงและแก้ไขรหัสคอมพิวเตอร์เพื่อให้ซอฟต์แวร์มีประสิทธิภาพ
  * ทดสอบและแก้ไขข้อบกพร่องของโปรแกรมก่อนส่งมอบให้ลูกค้า
  * ประสานงานกับทีมงานอื่น ๆ เพื่อให้งานสำเร็จตามกำหนดเวลา
  * บันทึกและจัดทำเอกสารคู่มือการใช้งานสำหรับซอฟต์แวร์

**ทักษะ คุณสมบัติ และประสบการณ์:**

  * มีปริญญาตรีหรือสูงกว่าในสาขาวิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง
  * มีประสบการณ์ด้านการเขียนโปรแกรมอย่างน้อย 1 ปีขึ้นไป
  * มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้ภาษาโปรแกรมเช่น Java, C++, C# หรือ Python
  * มีทักษะในการแก้ไขปัญหาและวิเคราะห์อย่างเป็นระบบ
  * มีความเข้าใจในการทำงานของโปรแกรมประยุกต์บนอุปกรณ์เคลื่อนที่
  * สามาถรถพูด ฟัง อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษ ได้อย่างดีมาก

สมัครตำแหน่งนี้ทันที หากคุณตรงตามคุณสมบัติที่กำหนดและสนใจจะเข้าร่วมกับบริษัท

title: Senior Salesforce Developer
content:
**Responsibilities**

  * As a member of the global CRM team, take responsibility of lean and user-friendly development together with internal and external colleagues.
  * Collaborate with Application Owners and cross-functional teams to understand and refine business requirements into specifications.
  * Handle support requests efficiently, ensuring timely resolution and minimal disruption to business operations. 
  * Design and implement scalable and sustainable Salesforce solutions to meet business needs according to global governance principles.
  * Contribute solutions to agreed standards and best practice, including test design, user and system documentation.
  * Support the communication with well-documented features, writing Release Notes and provide content for training material alongside developed features.
  * Participate in Go-Live Support and testing activities, conduct demo sessions and customer training on newly implemented features during reviews or optional with users.
  * Develop, test and deploy selected user stories, ensuring alignment with business objectives. 
  * Handle integrations to ERP and other customer facing solutions connected to Salesforce.
  * Be part of an agile development team and handle all development-related tasks independently.
  * Investigate root causes and errors as part of the operational team. Identify and deliver solutions by actively communicating remotely with team members and stakeholders.
  * Together with our Architect support and team up with our non-developer team members to solve requests from our global userbase across all time zones.
  * Work with international stakeholders as part of ongoing change management in a global environment.

**Qualifications**

  * 3+ years of experience working as a Salesforce Developer or related role.
  * Excellent knowledge of Salesforce CRM Platform on Sales and Service Cloud with insights in Experience Cloud and Optional Commerce Cloud.
  * Sound experience in configuration and development of Marketing Cloud (HTML, CSS, AMPscript, SQL, REST and SOAP API)
  * Advanced Experience in customization and development of SF applications using Flows, APEX, LWC and Webservices. 
  * Proven experience with Salesforce No Code and Low Code principles.
  * Advanced knowledge of Salesforce permissions, sharing settings, roles, reports, dashboards, etc. 
  * Hold certifications such as Platform App Builder or Developer I + II - additional MC certification(s) will be a strong advantage. 

**Desirable skills and experience:**

  * Experience in agile development methodologies. 
  * Experience in CI/CD principles and test automation (Github , Copado, Ranorex, Selenium).
  * Experience with version control and pull request workflows.
  * Experience with DX and Salesforce development tools. 
  * Knowledge of SAP to understand and resolve integration issues is a plus. 
  * Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure). 
  * Excellent collaboration and communication skills. 
  * Problem solving skills and a mindset for continuous improvement

Our client is the International System Integration business which the office
is located in Pinklao is currently looking for AI Developer Team Lead a
qualified candidate as a below information.

• Lead the AI development team in designing, implementing, and optimizing
AI/ML models.

and quality.

related field.

leadership role.

PyTorch, and Scikit-learn.

title: Programmer
content:
รายละเอียดงาน

1.ดูแลและรักษาระบบคอมพิวเตอร์และอุปกรณ์เกี่ยวเนื่อง

2.สามารถเข้าใจความต้องการของธุรกิจ, เข้าใจกระบวนการพัฒนาซอฟแวร์

3.สามารถออกแบบและพัฒนาโปรแกรม/เว็บไซด์/เว็บเซอร์วิส/application
ด้วยภาษาคอมพิวเตอร์ต่างๆ เช่น Java Spring, cloud aws, Strust2, Angular,
Node.js, React, C#.net, PHP หรือ อื่นๆ

4.พัฒนา / แก้ไข / ปรับปรุงระบบ Software ตามที่ได้รับหมอบหมาย

5.พัฒนาระบบที่เชื่อมต่อกับฐานข้อมูล ERP ให้มีประสิทธิภาพ

6.ทดสอบฟังก์ชั่นและการทำงานของระบบที่ได้รับการพัฒนาและสรุปผล

7.ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานผู้ใช้งาน
วางแผนและควบคุมการให้บริการด้านเทคนิดแก่ผู้ใช้งาน

คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร

  1. สัญชาติไทย
  2. ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรม หรือ วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือ ที่เกียวข้อง
  3. มีประสบการณ์ ด้านงานระบบคอมพิวเตอร์และบริหารฐานข้อมูล เขียนโปรแกรม อย่างน้อย 3 ปี
  4. มีประสบการณ์ ด้านการซ่อมอุปกรณ์คอมพิวเตอร์
  5. มีความรู้ ความเข้าใจ ใน ระบบ ERP
  6. มีความรู้และความสนใจ ใน application ใหม่ๆ
  7. สามารถทำงานภายใต้ข้อจำกัดเรื่องระยะเวลาได้
  8. สามารถเป็นวิทยากรในการอบรมการใช้ โปรแกรมสำเร็จรูปต่างๆ เช่น MS office
  9. สามารถเดินไปปฏิบัติงานต่างจังหวัด ด้วยตัวเองได้ เพื่อ support สาขาอื่นๆ
  10. บริษัทฯ ไม่มีรถรับส่ง สามารถเดินทางไปทำงานเองได้
  11. ทำงาน จันทร์-ศุกร์

title: Senior Full Stack Developer - Product Platform
content:
**Job Type** : Full-time

**About Us** : We are an innovative tech company dedicated to building
cutting-edge products that solve complex challenges in the [industry/sector].
As we continue to grow, we are looking for a talented Senior Full Stack
Developer to join our dynamic team and work on our core product platform. The
ideal candidate will be passionate about technology, have a strong foundation
in both front-end and back-end development, and thrive in a collaborative,
fast-paced environment.

**Job Description** : We are seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack
Developer to lead the development and enhancement of our product platform. As
part of a cross-functional team, you will be responsible for both the front-
end and back-end architecture, ensuring scalability, performance, and user-
centric design. Your work will directly impact the product's functionality and
user experience, shaping the future of our platform.

**Key Responsibilities** :

  * Design, develop, and maintain scalable and performant full-stack solutions for our product platform.
  * Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to define, design, and ship new features.
  * Build and optimize RESTful APIs, microservices, and databases.
  * Develop and maintain robust front-end user interfaces using modern frameworks (React, Angular, etc.).
  * Work with cloud-based solutions (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) for deployment, monitoring, and scaling.
  * Ensure code quality through code reviews, testing, and best practices in CI/CD pipelines.
  * Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize performance of both front-end and back-end components.
  * Lead technical discussions, contribute to architecture design decisions, and mentor junior developers.
  * Stay up to date with industry trends and emerging technologies to innovate and implement solutions.

**Skills & Qualifications**:

  * **Experience** : 5+ years of experience in full-stack development, with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies.
  * **Technologies** :
    * Front-end: Proficiency in JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
    * Back-end: Strong experience with server-side technologies such as Node.js, Python, Java, Ruby on Rails, or similar.
    * Databases: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, DynamoDB) databases.
    * Cloud Platforms: Experience with AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud services.
    * API Development: Experience with RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and microservices architecture.
  * **Tools** : Familiarity with version control tools (Git), CI/CD practices, and containerization (Docker).
  * **Soft Skills** : Excellent communication skills, strong problem-solving abilities, and a proactive, self-driven attitude.
  * **Education** : Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field, or equivalent work experience.

**Nice to Have** :

  * Experience with container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.
  * Knowledge of DevOps practices and infrastructure automation (Terraform, Jenkins).
  * Familiarity with Agile methodologies and Scrum frameworks.
  * Previous experience in building large-scale, consumer-facing products.

title: Senior Backend Developer (MongoDB, Distributed Systems)
content:
**Responsibilities**

  * Develop and maintain high-quality backend systems using C# and .NET, focusing on Cloud technologies.

  * Produce clean, efficient, maintainable, and performance-optimized code based on specifications.

  * Work with Message Brokers (Azure Service Bus/RabbitMQ/SQS or others)

  * Work with SQL and NoSQL Databases (MS SQL Server, MongoDB or others)

  * Perform as a hybrid engineer, capable of designing and implementing own code as well as reviewing, testing, and writing test automation for other engineers' code.

  * Ensure best practices, quality, maintainability, security and knowledge sharing within the team.

  * Lead pair programming and collaborate with other teams on design, code reviews, and testing.

  * Work with both existing products and the development of new features and products.

  * Adhere to best practices and write maintainable code and unit testing.

  * Work independently as a contributing member in a high-paced and focused team.

  * Continuously explore new technologies and programming techniques.

**  
**

**Qualifications**

  * Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or equivalent experience.

  * At least five years of experience writing programs in C# .NET or Java.

  * At least two years of experience working with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases.

  * Able to learn and understand various API services.

  * Solid understanding of Object-Oriented Programming concepts.

  * Experience working on Distributed Systems / Microservices.

  * Analytical and problem-solving skills, self-motivated, eager to solve problems, driven to completion, team player and with a "willing to learn" attitude.

  * Proficiency in English and practical communication abilities.

  * Open to relocation to Bangkok or currently based in Thailand.

  * Bonus points if experience with architecture patterns such as EventSourcing & CQRS.

**About Us**  
Seven Peaks is a world-class technology company specializing in Digital
Transformation for companies worldwide, delivering scalable software solutions
and experience design, aimed at driving business impact.

We are based in Bangkok, Thailand, with a growing team of more than 180
industry professionals from over 25 different countries currently providing
end-to-end Digital Product services - from Product Design, Mobile/Web
Development, Cloud Native Solutions, Data and Analytics, IOT Integrated
solutions to Quality Assurance and more.

Seven Peaks acquired Morphosis, one of the leading UX/UI design companies in
Thailand which is now part of the Seven Peaks group.

For more information please visit https://sevenpeakssoftware.com and
https://morphos.is/

**Benefits**

  * 10(15) days annual paid vacation

  * Flexible working hours

  * Hybrid Working Policy 

  * Health & Life insurance

  * Provident Fund

  * Free Lunch every Wednesday

  * Learning and Certifications support

  * Grade A Office in the heart of Bangkok, directly connect with MRT Queen Sirikit Station

  * International work environment with over 20 different nationalities in the team

  * Working with a wide and interesting portfolio of clients in SEA and globally

  * Opportunity to visit events and conferences

title: Full-Stack Developer (React & Node.js)
content:
**About Shopstack**  
Shopstack is a dynamic technology company headquartered in Thailand with
offices in Vietnam, dedicated to helping businesses across Southeast Asia
achieve their digital transformation goals. Since our founding, we’ve built a
reputation for delivering innovative solutions in CRM, e-commerce, CDP, and
data integration, empowering our clients to thrive in an evolving digital
landscape.

As part of the Hakuhodo DY ONE Group, a global leader in digital marketing and
technology solutions, we have strengthened our capabilities to deliver
integrated digital transformation solutions. By combining cutting-edge
technology with marketing expertise, we address the diverse needs of our
clients and help them expand into global markets with confidence.

ShopStack is actively seeking a Node.js and React.js Developer to elevate our
dynamic team. We offer competitive compensation, a stimulating work
environment, and significant growth opportunities. We're looking for driven
individuals eager to make an impact in the e-commerce space, particularly in
order management, logistics, and warehouse operations.

**Responsibilities:**

  * Develop and maintain scalable backend services using Node.js to support e-commerce operations.
  * Design, build, and optimize RESTful and GraphQL APIs for seamless communication between systems.
  * Implement secure authentication, authorization, and data protection mechanisms.
  * Create dynamic and responsive user interfaces using React.js, ensuring an engaging end-user experience.
  * Work across web and mobile platforms, ensuring seamless functionality across devices.
  * Integrate third-party services such as payment gateways, logistics providers, and order management systems.
  * Collaborate with UX/UI designers to convert wireframes and mockups into high-quality code.
  * Optimize backend performance and frontend rendering for a smooth user experience.
  * Ensure scalability, maintainability, and security of both backend and frontend code.
  * Debug, troubleshoot, and proactively resolve technical issues related to backend services and UI components.
  * Work closely with cross-functional teams to enhance e-commerce processes, including order management, logistics, and warehouse operations.

  
**Qualifications:**

  * Minimum 2 years of experience in software development.
  * Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including expertise in DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model.
  * Deep understanding of React.js and Node.js, along with their core principles.
  * Experience with popular React.js and Node.js frameworks and workflows.
  * Knowledge of recent EcmaScript specifications.
  * Familiarity with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js) is advantageous.
  * Experience working with RESTful and GraphQL APIs.
  * Understanding of modern frontend build pipelines and tools.
  * Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions.
  * E-commerce experience is a strong plus, particularly in:
    * Order management systems (OMS)
    * Warehouse and logistics workflows
    * Product catalog management
    * Payment processing and fraud detection
  * Strong communication skills; proficiency in English is beneficial.
  * Ability to work independently and manage tasks proactively.

  
**Benefits:**

  * Comprehensive health coverage.
  * Competitive salary packages.
  * Opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-growing e-commerce environment.
  * Collaborative and professional growth-oriented culture.

title: Senior Backend Developer (MongoDB, Distributed Systems)
content:
**Responsibilities**

  * Develop and maintain high-quality backend systems using C# and .NET, focusing on Cloud technologies.

  * Produce clean, efficient, maintainable, and performance-optimized code based on specifications.

  * Work with Message Brokers (Azure Service Bus/RabbitMQ/SQS or others)

  * Work with SQL and NoSQL Databases (MS SQL Server, MongoDB or others)

  * Perform as a hybrid engineer, capable of designing and implementing own code as well as reviewing, testing, and writing test automation for other engineers' code.

  * Ensure best practices, quality, maintainability, security and knowledge sharing within the team.

  * Lead pair programming and collaborate with other teams on design, code reviews, and testing.

  * Work with both existing products and the development of new features and products.

  * Adhere to best practices and write maintainable code and unit testing.

  * Work independently as a contributing member in a high-paced and focused team.

  * Continuously explore new technologies and programming techniques.

**  
**

**Qualifications**

  * Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or equivalent experience.

  * At least five years of experience writing programs in C# .NET or Java.

  * At least two years of experience working with MongoDB or other NoSQL databases.

  * Able to learn and understand various API services.

  * Solid understanding of Object-Oriented Programming concepts.

  * Experience working on Distributed Systems / Microservices.

  * Analytical and problem-solving skills, self-motivated, eager to solve problems, driven to completion, team player and with a "willing to learn" attitude.

  * Proficiency in English and practical communication abilities.

  * Open to relocation to Bangkok or currently based in Thailand.

  * Bonus points if experience with architecture patterns such as EventSourcing & CQRS.

**About Us**  
Seven Peaks is a world-class technology company specializing in Digital
Transformation for companies worldwide, delivering scalable software solutions
and experience design, aimed at driving business impact.

We are based in Bangkok, Thailand, with a growing team of more than 180
industry professionals from over 25 different countries currently providing
end-to-end Digital Product services - from Product Design, Mobile/Web
Development, Cloud Native Solutions, Data and Analytics, IOT Integrated
solutions to Quality Assurance and more.

Seven Peaks acquired Morphosis, one of the leading UX/UI design companies in
Thailand which is now part of the Seven Peaks group.

For more information please visit https://sevenpeakssoftware.com and
https://morphos.is/

**Benefits**

  * 10(15) days annual paid vacation

  * Flexible working hours

  * Hybrid Working Policy 

  * Health & Life insurance

  * Provident Fund

  * Free Lunch every Wednesday

  * Learning and Certifications support

  * Grade A Office in the heart of Bangkok, directly connect with MRT Queen Sirikit Station

  * International work environment with over 20 different nationalities in the team

  * Working with a wide and interesting portfolio of clients in SEA and globally

  * Opportunity to visit events and conferences

  * Standard perks such as free drinks and snacks in the office, team activities, trips and great parties

  * Sponsorship for visa and work permit for expatriates

title: Full Stack Developer (Hybrid in Bangkok, Relocation Provided)
content:
**About Nimble**

We solve our client's most difficult business challenges through technology.
Our company partners with the most ambitious companies around the world
creating long-term impact with the work we do. If you want to grow together,
work on challenging products and enjoy using the best tools and practices,
Nimble is the right place for you!

**Our Core Values**

  * **Ownership mentality:**  
Treat our company and our clients’ business as ours taking care of the
collective interests. This, in the end, translates to personal interests
achievement through our company

  * **Dependable & Resilient:**  
We go to great lengths for our clients, they can rely on us to deliver and all
our team members are reliable and trustworthy and we don’t give up when we
face challenges.

  * **Obsession for Excellence:  
** Our delivery quality has no parallel.

  * **Courage:**  
We must have the courage to speak up, raise our concerns in a timely manner
and be able to confront the status quo with ideas by being constructive and
without holding on to hard feelings.

**Working location**  

  * This position will be based in Nimble's Bangkok office. 
  * At the moment, we are only open for hybrid work mode (2 days in the office + 3 days WFH).

**What You Will Do**

  * You will be an active member or lead a team of developers**** in a project squad. We have a wide range of project sizes.
  * Decide which technologies are going to be used for front-end, back-end and define the overall architecture.
  * Work closely with the Product Owner to make sure the backlog is efficiently planned and occasionally assist in technical discussions with clients. Most of the client interfacing is done by the Product Owner.
  * Write clean, composable, and maintainable code as you develop world-class products for our clients.  

  * Write automated tests to build and maintain the product we build for our clients.
  * Do code reviews with your squad members.
  * Learn new technologies languages like Ruby, Go, or Elixir, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the evolving needs of our clients.
  * Knowledge sharing through team rituals.
  * Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission. Our handbook has been written by the whole team.  

**Job Requirements:**

  * ****Professional web development with 3+ years of full-time work experience****. Experience in**Ruby, JavaScript or Go is ideal (at least one of them)**. 
  * Comfortable working both on frontend and backend.
  * At least basic experience with a modern JavaScript framework like React JS/Redux, Vue JS or Angular JS.
  * Experience in writing automated tests for web applications. 
  * Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.
  * Believe that building great applications is not only about delivering code that “works”, but involves thinking about reusability, maintainability, security, and performance.
  * A "Can do attitude" and a product mindset.
  * Confidence in communicating in English.
  * Comfortable working in a hybrid setting.
  * **Currently based in Thailand or willing to relocate to Bangkok**.

**Why You'll Love Working Here**

  * **You will be proud** of any product that has our name on it.
  * We are an **engineering-focused company**. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.
  * We really pay attention and care about **processes, high quality, and aesthetics**.
  * **Strong processes**. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimate using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).
  * Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly **improve and grow**. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.
  * **The vast amount of learning resources** (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.
  * Provident Fund which allows you to save money every month and we match your monthly contributions (see more detailed info).
  * Private medical insurance (Allianz) **from day one** , company care fund, and social welfare coverage.
  * Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro, large screens, and any accessory to let you work comfortably. 
  * Casual work attire for everyone.
  * Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Bangkok next to BTS Asoke and MRT Sukhumvit (Interchange 21).
  * Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.
  * **Visa and work permit for foreigners**. If you live abroad, we provide a relocation assistance package consisting of a plane ticket allowance and up to 2 weeks of initial accommodation.
  * 25 days of paid leaves/year (13 public holidays + 12 personal days).
  * Sabbatical month every 3 years.
  * Company outing every year.
  * And many more perks!

If you are a passionate web professional looking to make a significant impact
in a growing software development company, we would love to hear from you.

Join us in shaping the future with elevating web innovation!

We keep our recruitment process practical and straightforward.

To learn more about how we work, check our handbook named Compass, Github
organization, and Medium account.

Want to see what we have built? Check our Dribbble and Behance accounts.

Want to keep in touch with us? Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Nimble is an equal opportunity employer.

title: Senior Fullstack Developer (Remote) 90k
content:
**Position: Senior Fullstack Developer (Remote) - permanent**

**Responsibilities:**

• Play a key role in the technical aspect of the teams and the overall
software development lifecycle.  
• Oversee project priorities, deadlines, and deliverables using your technical
expertise.  
• Collaborate closely with product owners to align business objectives and
system requirements, while constantly communicating with the team to ensure
understanding and tracking of business requirements and the value of features
developed.  
• Contribute innovative technological and product ideas to enhance the overall
service experience.  
• Support and engage in continuous improvements of the structure, processes,
and tools to help teams deliver more value.

**Qualifications:**  
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a related
field, or equivalent practical experience.  
• Over 5+ years of experience in software development.  
• Positive attitude, open-mindedness, and a strong sense of ownership that
drives the pursuit of better, faster, and more effective solutions.  
• Solid foundation in Computer Science (Algorithms, Data Structures, etc.).  
• Proficient in at least one general-purpose programming language (e.g., Rust,
Go, Java, Node.js, Python).  
• Proficient in at least one front-end framework (e.g., Vue.js/Nuxt.js,
React/Next.js, Angular).  
• Experience in architecting and developing distributed systems.  
• Familiar with RDBMS (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL databases.  
• Experience in API/Web service development (e.g., RESTful web services).  
• Knowledge of CI/CD, TDD, Kubernetes, Docker, Google Cloud, AWS is a plus.

**Qualifications (Preferred):**  
• Candidates with experience from a consultancy company background are
preferred.

title: Full Stack Engineer
content:
**Location: Krungthep Kreetha**

**Website: https://www.bgrimmpower.com/en/home**

**Job Scopes:**

  * Analyze business IT and digital requirements to propose efficient system architectures, covering workflows, networks, security, storage, databases, and technology stacks such as NodeJS, NextJS, React, Python, Structure/nonstructured Database, cloud-based tech solutions, etc.
  * Evaluate and recommend technical solutions from vendors or internal service providers, with a focus on leveraging cloud technologies and modern development frameworks.
  * Collaborate with project teams, business units, and vendors to design solutions aligned with organizational strategies and best practices in cloud-native and front-end development.
  * Lead technical discussions on topics impacting business operations and technology adoption, ensuring compatibility with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and scalable architectures.
  * Develop strategies for implementing modern digital solutions, including serverless architectures, containerized deployments (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), and microservices, to enhance efficiency and competitiveness.
  * Oversee and support project execution, ensuring alignment with IT roadmaps and business goals, while utilizing technologies such as React and NextJS for responsive and user-friendly applications.
  * Provide technical guidance to support teams on newly onboarded technologies, emphasizing JavaScript-based frameworks, cloud-native tools, and platform integrations.
  * Design solutions compatible with existing IT ecosystems, ensuring seamless integration with modern cloud platforms, front-end frameworks, and back-end services.
  * Implement end-to-end IT initiatives, including customer-facing applications, IoT integrations, operational systems, and cloud-native solutions to achieve business objectives.
  * Partner with service providers, business teams, and management to optimize software systems and technology performance, leveraging AWS, Azure, and GCP tools and services.

**Qualifications**

title: Technology Innovation Consultant
content:
We are seeking a dynamic and experienced **Technology Innovation Consultant**
to join our MMB team in Bangkok. The ideal candidate will be responsible for
leading, coordinating, developing, and implementing digital solutions that
align with our strategic objectives. This role requires a blend of technical
knowledge, project management skills, communication skills, negotiation
skills, and stakeholder management.

This position is part of Thailand Mercer Marsh Benefits and will be based in
the Bangkok, Thailand office, reporting to the Senior Health & Benefits
Consultant. The **Technology Innovation Consultant** will act as a benefits
technology consultant for MMB, responsible for benefits management technology
implementation, as well as leading the design, build, and execution of various
new benefit management solutions.

This person will be tasked with leading existing digital solutions
implementation projects with various clients across different industries, as
well as co-developing and coordinating local digital solutions related, but
not limited, to benefits management. He/she will work closely with MMB’s
Global Digital Solutions team and operations hub to ensure client requirements
are met in a timely manner. Additionally, you will need to manage stakeholders
in the project to ensure that we can deliver the solutions smoothly.

**What can you expect?**

  * The opportunity to coordinate and work with a team that is implementing digital solutions within Marsh and our affiliates.
  * Work with a team that strives to continually challenge the status quo, innovate, and create meaningful change within the organization, directly translating into designing and delivering best-in-class solutions for Marsh clients.

Excellent training and development with ongoing career opportunities and
continuing education support.

**What is in it for you?**

  * Competitive salary and benefits package.
  * Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
  * A dynamic and inclusive work environment that values diversity and innovation.
  * The chance to work with a talented team on impactful projects that drive business success.

**We will count on you to:**

  * **Strategy Development:** Collaborate with senior leadership to define the technology solutions strategy and roadmap, ensuring alignment with overall business goals.
  * **Project Management:** Oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of technology projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within scope, and within budget.
  * **Client Engagement:** Work closely with clients to understand their needs and challenges, providing tailored digital/technology solutions that enhance their business operations.
  * **Collaboration:** Coordinate well with multiple parties, both internal and external.
  * **Technology Literacy:** Be able to translate requirements into technical terms
  * **Stakeholder Management:** Communicate project status, risks, and opportunities to stakeholders, ensuring transparency and alignment throughout the project lifecycle.

**What you need to have:**

  * Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Information Technology, or a related field. A Master’s degree is a plus.
  * 5+ years of experience in digital solutions, project management, or a related field, preferably within a consulting or professional services environment.
  * Understanding of digital technologies, including cloud computing, data analytics, and software development.
  * Innovative mindset – able to keep up with market trends and adapt to MMB’s requirements.
  * Proven experience in leading cross-functional teams and managing complex projects.
  * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders.
  * Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a focus on delivering results.
  * Proficiency in both English and Thai.

**What makes you stand out:**

Experience in digital/technology implementation

A background and knowledge in insurance and/or employee benefits

Initiative and innovation thinker

Ability to adapt to change and be flexible.

title: Senior Technical Artist
content:
**รายละเอียดงาน (Key Responsibilities)**

  * ทำงานร่วมกับทีม Developers และทีม Artists เพื่อพัฒนาคุณภาพกราฟิกของเกมให้สวยงามและสมจริง
  * ออกแบบและสร้าง Interactive Effects, Particle Effects และ Visual Effects ในเกม
  * ปรับปรุงและ Optimize Effect ภายในเกมให้มีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดสำหรับแพลตฟอร์มที่รองรับ
  * สร้างและปรับแต่ง Shader Graph ให้เหมาะสมกับเกมและแพลตฟอร์ม
  * วิเคราะห์และปรับปรุงงานด้านเทคนิคให้สอดคล้องกับเป้าหมายของโปรเจกต์

**คุณสมบัติ (Qualifications)**

  * วุฒิการศึกษาขั้นต่ำระดับปริญญาตรี สาขาดิจิทัลอาร์ตส์, คอมพิวเตอร์แอนิเมชัน หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง
  * มีประสบการณ์ทำงานด้าน Technical Art อย่างน้อย 3 ปี และเคยมีส่วนร่วมในโปรเจกต์เกม
  * มีประสบการณ์การใช้งาน Unity และสามารถเขียน Scripting ได้
  * มีความเข้าใจด้านศิลปะ และสามารถนำ Asset มาปรับแต่งใน Unity ให้ได้คุณภาพกราฟิกที่ตรงตามเป้าหมายของเกม
  * มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับ Particle System และ Material ใน Unity เป็นอย่างดี
  * มีความเชี่ยวชาญด้านการ Optimize เกมให้เหมาะสมกับ Performance ของอุปกรณ์ที่รองรับ
  * มีประสบการณ์พัฒนาเกมบนแพลตฟอร์ม Mobile Game Applications

**Our Benefits:**

  * Bonus
  * Provident Fund
  * Birthday Leave
  * Life / Accident Insurance
  * Flexible Time

**Working day:** Mon - Fri  
**Office Location:** Sermmit Tower - Near BTS Asok, MRT Sukhumvit

  * Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  * SAP certification is a plus.

title: Mobile developer (Kotlin/Java or Swift) – Well-known financial company
content:
Cathcart Technology is partnering with a well-known financial company in
Thailand that specializes in developing one-stop financial service
applications. As they continue to grow, they are expanding their mobile
development team to enhance their in-house financial products and deliver
seamless digital experiences to users.

We are looking for a strong Native iOS/Android Developer with a passion for
mobile development and an open mindset to explore new technologies. The ideal
candidate is eager to learn, adapt, and contribute to building innovative
financial solutions.

**Responsibilities:**

  * Develop and maintain applications using Native.
  * Collaborate with team to implement new features.
  * Ensure code quality through Unit and Integration Testing by Automation test.
  * Optimize app performance, usability, and security.
  * Debug and resolve bugs and technical issues.
  * Stay updated on Android/iOS and fintech trends.

**Qualifications:**

  * 2+ years of mobile development experience using Kotlin/Java or Swift.
  * Experience with Git and version control workflows.
  * Understanding of Agile development methodologies.
  * Familiar with Web application technologies (JavaScript HTML/CSS etc.)
  * Experience in the financial industry is a big plus, especially in banking, fintech, or payment systems.

If you’re a **dedicated mobile developer** looking to advance your career in
**financial technology** , we’d love to hear from you! For more details,
please contact Romfa at Cathcart Technology at 094-916-1524.

title: Senior Datastage Developer (112010002202580120)
content:
**Job Title** : Senior DataStage Developer

**Position type** : Full time

**Place of work** : Bangkok, Silom

**Salary** : Negotiable

**Working conditions** : Working conditions are normal for an office
environment.

**Department/Function** : Business Intelligence Department

**Reporting to Title** : Head of Department

**The company and the mission:**

BRED IT (Thailand) Ltd.is a wholly owned subsidiary of the French bank BRED
Banque Populaire based out of Paris (BPCE Group).

BRED IT was established in 2008 with the objective to become the IT hub for
BRED Group Commercial Banks in South East Asia, Pacific Ocean, and the Horn of
Africa areas.

In parallel, BRED IT has expanded its activities since 2011 to also provide
remote IT services to Paris Headquarters.

Today, with more than 200 employees, BRED IT fully supports Banque Franco Lao
in Laos, BRED Bank Cambodia, BRED Bank Vanuatu, BRED Bank Solomon Islands,
BRED Bank Fiji and Banque pour le commerce et l’industrie Mer Rouge (BCIMR) in
Djibouti:

BRED IT hosts and manages all layers of BRED International Banks Information
Systems: From Infrastructures to Applications (Core Banking, Internet/Mobile
Banking, E-Payments…), on a 24x7 basis.

Half of the activity is currently performed for BRED Headquarters, with a
focus on Projects (built with Java, COBOL, PHP, DataStage) and
Production/Devops.

We are a unique company, thanks to our identity and our history: We place our
expertise at the service of BRED Group and develop our activities with an
entrepreneurial structure.

By putting BRED group best interests first, it allows us to deliver tailor-
made solutions with high value-added.

**Main Responsibilities:**

· Responsible for :

o Develop ETL process including data warehouse, data mart.

o Analyze the business needs and propose technical solutions within bank
projects

o Creating tests plans, problem-solving and correcting software defects.

o Adhering to in-house quality procedures.

· Be autonomous to make right technical decisions in the course of its duties.

· Constantly updating technical knowledge.

**Education**

  * Bachelor’s degree BSc. Computer Science. (mandatory)

**Language skills**

  * Good command in English.
  * French reading is a plus.

**Experience and Skills**

  * 5 years at least in Datastage Development
  * Team player, Open-minded, anticipation and speed adaptation.
  * Strong Datawarehouse concepts
  * Ability to work with Agile Method
  * Ability to work effectively on tight deadlines.
  * Rigor and organization skills are required, whilst working to tight deadlines
  * A commitment to quality and a thorough approach to the work 
  * Willing to ‘go the extra mile’
  * Banking knowledge is a plus.

**Technical Skills Required**

  * Strong ETL (Datastage) developing skills

· Strong proficiency with SQL programming (query, optimization)

**What we offer:**

  * Attractive compensation (includes fixed and performance bonus)
  * Hybrid working mode with 2 days work from home per week with flexible working hours
  * Additional 10 days of work from anywhere per year
  * Work from home allowance for you to buy equipment to facilitate working at home 
  * Standby and Overtime allowance for Level 2 support employees who are required to work on a 24x7 basis
  * Annual leave from 14-25 days 
  * Provident Fund with competitive company contribution rates starting from 6% up to 12% 
  * Medical insurance and life insurance covering employee and dependent; spouse and child or children from your first day
  * Outpatient Department (OPD) coverage of 2,500THB per visit for 31 visits per year.
  * In Patient Department (IPD) coverage.
  * Dental Care coverage of 4,000THB per year.
  * Eye Care coverage of 5,000THB per year.
  * Employee Assistance Program (EAP) providing mental support for colleagues to release stress and alleviate employee life problems.
  * Learning and Development benefits, including an online e-learning platform 
  * Staff wellness program including badminton, football, dance classes, and yoga classes.
  * Monthly activities such as snacks and food, wine and cheese, games, events, lucky draw, and staff parties.
  * Annual Health checkup benefits

title: Android Developer (Hybrid in Bangkok, Relocation Provided)
content:
**About Nimble**

We solve our client's most difficult business challenges through technology.
Our company partners with the most ambitious companies around the world
creating long-term impact with the work we do. If you want to grow together,
work on challenging products and enjoy using the best tools and practices,
Nimble is the right place for you!

**Our Core Values**

  * **Ownership mentality:**  
Treat our company and our clients’ business as ours taking care of the
collective interests. This, in the end, translates to personal interests
achievement through our company

  * **Dependable & Resilient:**  
We go to great lengths for our clients, they can rely on us to deliver and all
our team members are reliable and trustworthy and we don’t give up when we
face challenges.

  * **Obsession for Excellence:  
** Our delivery quality has no parallel.

  * **Courage:**  
We must have the courage to speak up, raise our concerns in a timely manner
and be able to confront the status quo with ideas by being constructive and
without holding on to hard feelings.

**Working location**  

  * This position will be based in Nimble's Bangkok office.

  * At the moment, we are only open for hybrid work mode (2 days in the office + 3 days WFH).

**What You Will Do**

  * You will be an active member or lead a team of developers in a project squad. We have a wide range of project sizes.

  * Write clean, composable, and maintainable code as you develop world-class products for our clients.

  * Write automated tests to build and maintain the product we build for our clients.

  * Do code reviews with your squad members.

  * Learn new technologies, languages, and techniques so that you are able to adapt to the evolving needs of our clients.

  * Mentor junior members via pair-programming and sharing your knowledge through team rituals (sprint planning and bi-weekly retrospectives).

  * Collaborate with other team members to define the internal processes and initiatives to help the company accomplish its mission. Our handbook has been written by the whole team.

**Job Requirements**

  * **At least 3 years of professional Android development experience.**

  * **Experience in Kotlin is a must. Experience in Flutter is a big plus.**

  * Experience in writing automated tests for mobile applications.

  * Enjoy working on challenging solutions and systems.

  * Believe that building great applications is not only about delivering code that “works”, but involves thinking about reusability, maintainability, security, and performance.

  * A "Can do attitude" and a product mindset.

  * Confidence in communicating in English.

  * **Currently based in Thailand or willing to relocate to Bangkok**

**Why You'll Love Working Here**

  * **You will be proud** of any product that has our name on it.

  * We are an **engineering-focused company**. Both co-founders are software engineers and led the tech teams at the most prominent e-commerce powerhouses in South East Asia.

  * We really pay attention and care about **processes, high quality, and aesthetics**.

  * **Strong processes**. We not only believe but also really work following agile principles. Developers work on well-sized and well-defined user stories, do estimate using points and work iteratively in short sprints (1-2 weeks).

  * Regular one-on-one reviews to constantly **improve and grow**. We have a clearly defined process for our developers to level up continuously not only their technical skills but also soft skills.

  * **The vast amount of learning resources** (Pluralsight, Pragpub, Leanpub, (e-)books, etc.) and yearly education allowance to step up your game.

  * Provident Fund which allows you to save money every month and we match your monthly contributions (see more detailed info).

  * Private medical insurance (Allianz) **from day one** , company care fund, and social welfare coverage.

  * Great equipment consisting of a MacBook Pro, large screens, and any accessory to let you work comfortably. 

  * Casual work attire for everyone.

  * Comfortable and modern office space environment in the heart of Bangkok next to BTS Asoke and MRT Sukhumvit (Interchange 21).

  * Our office kitchen is fully stocked with drinks and snacks for the team.

  * **Visa and work permit for foreigners**. If you live abroad, we provide a relocation assistance package consisting of a plane ticket allowance and up to 2 weeks of initial accommodation.

  * 25 days of paid leaves/year (13 public holidays + 12 personal days).

  * Sabbatical month every 3 years.

  * Company outing every year.

  * And many more perks!

If you are a passionate Android professional looking to make a significant
impact in a growing software development company, we would love to hear from
you.

Join us in shaping the future by elevating Android innovation!

We keep our recruitment process practical and straightforward.

To learn more about how we work, check our handbook named Compass, Github
organization, and Medium account.

Want to see what we have built? Check our Dribbble and Behance accounts.

Want to keep in touch with us? Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn.

Nimble is an equal opportunity employer.

title: Senior Java Developer (International Environment)
content:
More than just a recruitment company. At PRTR, we have been a part of our
customer's success for 30 years as their total HR solutions partner. With 550
dedicated professionals and over 15,000 outsourced staff, we will continue to
carry out our mission to develop a better career, a better life, and a better
society, and thrive to become the No.1 people solutions organization in
Southeast Asia.  
  
PRTR Technical is looking to speak with a Senior Java Developer who would be
keen to work with an international business who are growing its development
centre in Bangkok.  
  
**Responsibilities**  

  * Engaging in the BE (Java/Spring Boot) developments within the development team.
  * Constantly updating technical knowledge.
  * Troubleshooting issues.
  * Being autonomous to make the right technical decisions in the course of its duties. 
  * Using agile methodology, the Senior Java Developer will advise and participate in technical projects.
  * Providing technical support to other team members.

**Requirements**  

  * Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Engineering.
  * Have more than 5 years of experience in software development.
  * Ability to use JAVA / Spring Boot is a must.
  * Ability to use Angular 2+ is preferred.
  * English is a must.

title: Software Development Manager
content:
**About the role**  
  
Forth Smart Service Public Company Limited' is seeking an experienced Software
Development Manager to lead and oversee the development of innovative software
solutions for our business. As a key member of our technology team, you will
be responsible for managing a team of talented developers, driving the
development process, and ensuring the delivery of high-quality, efficient
software that meets the strategic goals of the organisation. This is a full-
time, on-site role based in Bangkok.

**What you'll be doing**

  * Manage and lead a team of software developers, providing technical guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure the successful delivery of projects
  * Oversee the software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment, ensuring adherence to best practices and industry standards
  * Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including project managers, business analysts, and stakeholders, to understand and translate business requirements into technical solutions
  * Implement and maintain effective development processes, tools, and methodologies to drive efficiency, quality, and continuous improvement
  * Stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends and industry best practices, and recommend and implement new technologies and approaches to enhance the company's software capabilities
  * Provide technical expertise and guidance to the team, helping to resolve complex issues and ensure the overall quality and performance of the software
  * Monitor project progress, identify and mitigate risks, and communicate updates and status reports to stakeholders

**What we're looking for**

  * Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
  * Minimum 5 years of experience in software development, with a proven track record of leading and managing software development teams
  * Proficient in various programming languages, frameworks, and tools, such as Java, Python, React, and Agile methodologies
  * Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to think strategically and make data-driven decisions
  * Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders
  * Knowledge of software development best practices, including version control, testing, and deployment
  * Familiarity with cloud computing technologies, such as AWS or Azure, is preferred

Apply now to join our dynamic team and be a part of our exciting journey!

title: Backend Developer (Node.js + Database)
content:
* คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร  
\- มีประสบการณ์ในการพัฒนา Backend ด้วย Node.js อย่างน้อย 2-3 ปี  
\- มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการออกแบบและพัฒนาฐานข้อมูล MySQL และ PostgreSQL  
\- มีความเข้าใจในการออกแบบ RESTful APIs และ Microservices  
\- สามารถเขียน SQL Query ที่มีประสิทธิภาพและเหมาะสมกับการใช้งาน  
\- มีประสบการณ์ในการใช้ Version Control (Git)

  * ความรับผิดชอบ  
\- พัฒนาและดูแล Backend Services ด้วย Node.js  
\- ออกแบบและพัฒนาฐานข้อมูลให้มีประสิทธิภาพ  
\- พัฒนา APIs ที่มีความปลอดภัยและมีประสิทธิภาพ  
\- ทำงานร่วมกับทีม Frontend เพื่อพัฒนาระบบให้ตรงตามความต้องการ  
\- แก้ไขปัญหาและปรับปรุงประสิทธิภาพของระบบ

  * ทักษะที่ต้องการ  
\- Node.js และ Express.js  
\- MySQL และ PostgreSQL  
\- RESTful APIs  
\- Git  
\- Unit Testing

สถานที่ทำงาน

คีย์เอ็นซ์เติบโตอย่างมั่นคงมาโดยตลอดนับตั้งแต่ปี พ.ศ. 2517
จนกลายเป็นผู้นำระดับโลกในด้านการพัฒนานวัตกรรม ระบบอัตโนมัติสำหรับอุตสาหกรรม
และอุปกรณ์การตรวจสอบ รวมจนถึงเครื่องอ่านบาร์โค้ด เลเซอร์มาร์กเกอร์ ระบบวิชัน
เครื่องมือวัด ไมโครสโคป เซนเซอร์ และเครื่องกำจัดไฟฟ้าสถิต

ผลิตภัณฑ์นวัตกรรมใหม่เราไม่เพียงตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้าในปัจจุบัน
แต่ยังสามารถรองรับความต้องการของลูกค้าในอนาคตในอุตสาหกรรมการผลิตและการวิจัยต่างๆอีกมากมาย  
เราไม่หยุดยั้งที่จะคาดการณ์ถึงความต้องการในอนาคตของตลาดเพื่อนำเสนอวิธีการแก้ปัญหาแห่งอนาคตล่วงหน้า

ความภาคภูมิใจของคีย์เอ็นซ์ไม่ใช่เพียงแค่ผลิตภัณฑ์ของเราเท่านั้น แต่ยังรวมไปถึง  
การให้บริการของเราด้วย
ลูกค้าของเราจะได้รับประโยชน์จากการร่วมงานกับวิศวกรฝ่ายขายที่เปี่ยมด้วยความรู้ของเรา
ซึ่งสามารถช่วยแก้ปัญหาการประยุกต์ใช้งานและตอบคำถามทางเทคนิคเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ของเราได้อย่างรวดเร็ว

ผลลัพธ์ทางธุรกิจของเราคือสิ่งที่เกิดขึ้นโดยตรงจากการให้ความสำคัญต่อปรัชญาทางธุรกิจของเราอย่างต่อเนื่อง  
และความสำเร็จของเราก็ยังเป็นที่ยอมรับไปทั่วในโลกธุรกิจ  
โดย KEYENCE
ได้รับการจัดอันดับให้อยู่ในกลุ่มของบริษัทที่ยอดเยี่ยมมาอย่างต่อเนื่อง

2567

title: Senior Oracle ERP Specialist (Developer & Business Analyst)
content:
**Choose the role that best matches your skills – or apply for both!**

**Job Description:**

**ERP Developers:**

  * Develop, customize, and maintain **Oracle EBS applications** (Inventory, Financials, Purchasing, Order Management, etc.).
  * Write and optimize **SQL, PL/SQL, APIs, XML Publisher, Oracle Workflow, and Forms Personalization**.
  * Conduct system analysis, testing, and troubleshooting to ensure system performance.
  * Work closely with Business Analysts and end-users to deliver ERP solutions.

**ERP Business Analysts:**

  * Analyze business processes related to **Order to Cash, Procure to Pay, and Plan to Produce**.
  * Gather business requirements and translate them into ERP solutions.
  * Configure Oracle ERP modules and work with developers on system enhancements.
  * Provide end-user support, training, and system documentation.

**Qualification:**

  * Bachelor's degree or higher in **Computer Science, Information Systems, Accounting Information Systems, or related fields**.
  * **5+ years** of experience with **Oracle ERP (EBS 12.2 or later)**.
  * Strong expertise in either **Oracle ERP development** (SQL, PL/SQL, APIs) **or Business Analysis** (process improvement, system configuration).
  * Experience in **Manufacturing, Order to Cash, and Procure to Pay flows** is a plus.
  * Good communication skills in **English & Thai**.

title: Senior RPA Developer
content:
Our client is seeking a Senior RPA Developer to join their dynamic team in
Bangkok. This role offers the opportunity to design, develop, and test
automation workflows, enhancing skills through paired programming tasks with
experienced developers.

The successful candidate will also be responsible for identifying, fixing
issues in the codebase and providing support during the launch and
implementation of RPA solutions, you also will collaborate with stakeholders
to understand business requirements and existing AI systems.

Key Responsibility

  * Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and identify areas where RPA can be applied effectively
  * Design, develop, and test automation workflows using RPA tools and techniques
  * Engage in paired programming tasks with higher-level developers to learn from their experience and gain insights into best practices
  * Continuously improve coding skills by exploring new techniques, studying documentation, and staying updated with industry trends
  * Identify and fix issues in the codebase to ensure the software functions correctly
  * Provide support during the launch and implementation of RPA solutions, including troubleshooting, addressing issues, and ensuring successful deployment
  * Perform document processes and end-user instructions to maintain consistency and facilitate knowledge transfer

Key Requirement

  * Bachelor's degree in computer engineering or Computer Science
  * 5 years of experience as an RPA Developer and Development related fields
  * Experience with programming and software development
  * **Knowledge of low code development such as Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps), RPA Platform (SAP Build, SAP IRPA)**
  * Good knowledge in computer programming language
  * Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment
  * Fast learning and hard-working, Good communication skills with the ability to interact with stakeholders at all levels of the organisation

Our client is a leading player in the thier industry, known for its innovative
approach to solving complex business problems. They believe in providing
opportunities for growth and learning, encouraging their employees to
continuously enhance their skills and reach new heights in their careers.

Ready for an exciting career move? Don't miss this opportunity! Apply today by
clicking on the link. We look forward to receiving your application!

Due to the high volume of applications, our team will only be in touch if your
application is shortlisted.

Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) Limited  
Recruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551
